original: rigs ni du ma 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: rigs ni du ma 'byung ba'o //

original: gzugs can ma yi gnas brten nas //
analyzed: gzugs can ma yi gnas brten nas //

original: dpa' bo sa la bsgyings par 'gyur //
analyzed: dpa' bo sa la bsgyings par 'gyur //
translated: the hero will strut on the earth.

original: gzugs ni gzugs med gyur pa'i gzugs //
analyzed: gzugs ni gzugs med gyur pa'i gzugs //

original: bde mchog dang ni mnyam par 'khyer //
analyzed: bde mchog dang ni mnyam par 'khyer //

original: dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las //🔽rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /
analyzed: dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las // rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /
translated: From the union of all heroes🔽comes Vajrasattva, the supreme bliss,

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs //
translated: the vajra dakini, the tathāgata.

translated: The Bhagavān, the Lord, has taught this.

original: gzugs can ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin rtsa'i 'khor lo'i rang bzhin dang / gnas kyi rnam par gzhag pa dang / rgyud kyi mtshan nyid kyi cho ga ste le'u drug pa'o ////
analyzed: gzugs can ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin rtsa'i 'khor lo'i rang bzhin dang / gnas kyi rnam par gzhag pa dang / rgyud kyi mtshan nyid kyi cho ga ste le'u drug pa'o ////
translated: This is the sixth chapter on the characteristics of the channels’ nature, the nature of the cakras, the presentation of the abodes, and the characteristics of the tantra, from the great king of yoginī tantras, the glorious Ocean of Dakas.

original: de nas rnal 'byor mchog gi sa //
analyzed: de nas rnal 'byor mchog gi sa //

original: cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis te //
analyzed: cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis te //

original: gang gis khva gdong ma byung ba //
analyzed: gang gis khva gdong ma byung ba //
translated: by which the Kākāsyā arises,

original: de yis cho gas thar 'gro ma //
analyzed: de yis cho gas thar 'gro ma //

analyzed: nye ba'i gling du gnas ma ste // khyu mchog 'pho dang bzang po ma //

original: sa ga'i zla bar shes bya ste //
analyzed: sa ga'i zla bar shes bya ste //
translated: She should be known as Sāgarikā in the month of Jyeṣṭha,

original: sa lnga par ni @103a *//🔽'dod pa yin //
analyzed: sa lnga par ni @103a *// 'dod pa yin //

original: lha mo sgo na gnas pa mo //
analyzed: lha mo sgo na gnas pa mo //

analyzed: k'a ni chos dbyings mar 'du shes //

original: gnyis pa chos kyi sku dang ni //
analyzed: gnyis pa chos kyi sku dang ni //

analyzed: de las longs spyod rdzogs 'byung ba //

analyzed: sy'a ni sbrul pa'i sku yin te // lte snying mgrin pa mgo bo las //

analyzed: bu ga bzhi rnams shes bya ste //

analyzed: bya rog 'dra ba'i srog gdong can // de la rtag tu mngon spyod ni //

analyzed: srog chags rnams ni skad cig gsod //
translated: the manifest activity.🔽Attracting nāgas,

analyzed: klu rnams dgug par bya ba dang // char dbab pa dang rengs pa'o //

analyzed: bde ba 'dod pas 'gro ba mo //

original: sngags bden las kyi bdag nyid can //
analyzed: sngags bden las kyi bdag nyid can //
translated: The essence of the truth of mantra action

analyzed: bya rog gtso mo de la brten //

original: rdo rje phag mo de la ni //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo de la ni //

original: bya rog ma ni gnas su son //
analyzed: bya rog ma ni gnas su son //

original: sum cu rtsa bdun rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa bdun rnal 'byor ma //

original: sngags 'di las ni byung ba yin //
analyzed: sngags 'di las ni byung ba yin //

analyzed: aom ba na dzra mo k'a bha k'a ga sy'a ba ya te ke b'i h'um de h'um sh'a pha ya ta h'um pha h'um ta pha sv'a ta h'a pha aom ta sv'a h'um ha h'um/
translated: oṃ va na jra mo kā bhakā gasyā vayat e ke bī hūṃ de hūṃ śā pha yata hūṃ pha hūṃ ta pha svā tā hā pha oṃ ta svā hūṃ ha hūṃ

analyzed: 'dir ni ring thung dbye ba las //

original: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin can //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin can //

analyzed: thung du thabs kyis rang bzhin dang // ring po shes rab mngon par brjod //

original: kha dog nag mo drag chen mo //
analyzed: kha dog nag mo drag chen mo //

original: lhag ma mkha' 'gro ma dang mtshungs //
analyzed: lhag ma mkha' 'gro ma dang mtshungs //

analyzed: gang phyir byang chub sems zhu ba //

original: de tshe bya rog las rgyal mo //
analyzed: de tshe bya rog las rgyal mo //

original: nam mkhar bya rog bzhin 'khor ba //
analyzed: nam mkhar bya rog bzhin 'khor ba //

analyzed: de phyir 'og dang steng du lta //

original: bya rog bzhin du ring 'phur nas //
analyzed: bya rog bzhin du ring 'phur nas //

original: bya rog gling du slar 'ong ba'o //
analyzed: bya rog gling du slar 'ong ba'o //

original: der son pa ni bde chen po //
analyzed: der son pa ni bde chen po //

original: lus kyis nyams su myong ba'o //
analyzed: lus kyis nyams su myong ba'o //

original: bsod nams las kyis skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: bsod nams las kyis skye bar 'gyur //

original: rnal 'byor gong nas gong du'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gong nas gong du'o //

original: bsod nams min ldan de bzhin 'dir //
analyzed: bsod nams min ldan de bzhin 'dir //

original: dmyal ba bya rog dum bu can //
analyzed: dmyal ba bya rog dum bu can //

original: pha rol phyin tshul rnams kyi yang //
analyzed: pha rol phyin tshul rnams kyi yang //

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin par 'dod //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin par 'dod //

original: ma byin len pas dmyal ba pa //
analyzed: ma byin len pas dmyal ba pa //

original: bya rog bzhin du rtag tu bkris //
analyzed: bya rog bzhin du rtag tu bkris //

original: de yi de ltar las dus su //
analyzed: de yi de ltar las dus su //
translated: At that time, for that person,

analyzed: mi gang ngang gis 'chi bar 'gyur //

original: rnal 'byor ma ni de bsgoms nas //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma ni de bsgoms nas //

original: bde chen nyams su myong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: bde chen nyams su myong bar 'gyur //

original: rnal 'byor ma yi spyod kun kyang //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi spyod kun kyang //

original: rang gis rang ni thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: rang gis rang ni thob par 'gyur //

original: las ma byas na gang gi ni //
analyzed: las ma byas na gang gi ni //

original: las can med cing las byed med //
analyzed: las can med cing las byed med //
translated: there is no agent of action and no action.

original: rang sems 'pho ba las yin te //
analyzed: rang sems 'pho ba las yin te //

original: las de las byed pa yang de //
analyzed: las de las byed pa yang de //

original: lus kyi dbyibs dang gzugs bdag nyid //
analyzed: lus kyi dbyibs dang gzugs bdag nyid //

original: sems med pa ni sems pa mchog /
analyzed: sems med pa ni sems pa mchog /

original: lag pa rkang pa thams cad kyis //
analyzed: lag pa rkang pa thams cad kyis //

original: gang byas las byed pa rang ngo //
analyzed: gang byas las byed pa rang ngo //

original: de kun gyi nar khyer ba ni //
analyzed: de kun gyi nar khyer ba ni //

analyzed: yang dag las mtha'i mtshan nyid do //

analyzed: las kyang dge ba rgyu don gnyer //

analyzed: de bzhin bza' ba 'du ba ni //

analyzed: grong dang grong khyer gnas pa dang // ri la sogs pa'i rtse chen du // dam tshig don @104a *//

analyzed: du mchod par bya // rnal 'byor dngos grub 'bras rab ster //

original: mkha' 'gro ma yi gzugs brnyan kyang //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi gzugs brnyan kyang //

original: khyab gnas rlung gi ming can te //
analyzed: khyab gnas rlung gi ming can te //

analyzed: srog dang thur sel mnyam gnas dang // khyab byed ji lta'i rim gnyis kyis //

analyzed: mkha' 'gro de bzhin l'a ma dang // du ma skyes ma dang gzugs can ma //

analyzed: 'ug gdong khyi dang phag gdong ma; ;rim pas klu dang rus spal rtsangs //

analyzed: lha sbyin dang ni nor las rgyal //

analyzed: rtag tu brtan ma pho nya gnyis //

original: dga' dang skyo ba zhes bya ba //
analyzed: dga' dang skyo ba zhes bya ba //

original: mche ma dang ni 'joms ma mchog /
analyzed: mche ma dang ni 'joms ma mchog /

analyzed: mdor bstan pa yi tshig 'di yang //

original: rgyas bshad kun nas brjod par bya //
analyzed: rgyas bshad kun nas brjod par bya //

original: phag mos mchod pa byas nas ni //
analyzed: phag mos mchod pa byas nas ni //
translated: Having made an offering to Vārāhī,

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus pa // ji srid srog sogs rlung rnams kyi; ;so so re re'i ming 'du shes //
translated: she asked Vajrasattva:

analyzed: bdag gi ston pa ngo mtshar che //

original: dus kun du ni skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: dus kun du ni skye bar 'gyur //

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //

analyzed: dang por gtso bo can 'dzin pa; ;stong pa'i ngo bos grol bar 'gyur //

analyzed: rdo rje lta bu'i rlung dgod bya //

original: rten ni snod kyi 'jig rten la'o //
analyzed: rten ni snod kyi 'jig rten la'o //

original: gang phyir 'jig pa thim 'gyur ba //
analyzed: gang phyir 'jig pa thim 'gyur ba //
translated: Because the dissolution of destruction

analyzed: de yi dbyibs tshul kyang med pa //
translated: also does not have the mode of shape,

original: de phyir thur sel zhes bya yang //
analyzed: de phyir thur sel zhes bya yang //
translated: therefore, although it is called “evacuative,”

original: 'gro ba dang ni 'ong bar bstan //
analyzed: 'gro ba dang ni 'ong bar bstan //

original: mnyam gnas rigs su song nas ni //
analyzed: mnyam gnas rigs su song nas ni //
translated: Having gone into the family of the “evenly placed,”

original: sngon du gang dang gang rnams kyis //
analyzed: sngon du gang dang gang rnams kyis //
translated: it is the one who previously

original: ngag tu brjod pa smra bar @104b 'gyur //
analyzed: ngag tu brjod pa smra bar @104b 'gyur //
translated: speaks with whatever speech.

analyzed: sngon du bag chags ma lus pa'o // khyab byed 'gro ba thams cad la //
translated: Previously, all traces are left behind.🔽The all-pervading one is the wind of karma

original: rgyas 'debs pas na las kyi rlung //
analyzed: rgyas 'debs pas na las kyi rlung //

original: klu ni khro bo'i ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: klu ni khro bo'i ngo bo nyid //

original: khyab byed de bzhin tshig gnyis te //
analyzed: khyab byed de bzhin tshig gnyis te //

original: rus sbal ser sna'i ngo bo ni //
analyzed: rus sbal ser sna'i ngo bo ni //

original: smra ba yi ni mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: smra ba yi ni mtshan nyid do //

original: rtsangs pa 'dod chags mnyam gnas so //
analyzed: rtsangs pa 'dod chags mnyam gnas so //

original: thur sel phrag dog lha sbyin no //
analyzed: thur sel phrag dog lha sbyin no //

original: nor rgyal gti mug bdag nyid do //
analyzed: nor rgyal gti mug bdag nyid do //

original: srog gi rlung ni grangs gnyis las //
analyzed: srog gi rlung ni grangs gnyis las //

original: dga' ba'i ye shes can shes bya //
analyzed: dga' ba'i ye shes can shes bya //

original: skyo ba de yis btags pa'o //
analyzed: skyo ba de yis btags pa'o //

original: de phyir mkhas pas so sor shes pa yis //
analyzed: de phyir mkhas pas so sor shes pa yis //

analyzed: gang phyir srog gi rlung ni thams cad bdag nyid skye //

analyzed: ji ltar sa ni bcu gnyis las //

analyzed: thog ma de nyid bcu gnyis pa'o //

original: bcu po rnams kyis de shes bya //
analyzed: bcu po rnams kyis de shes bya //

analyzed: gang phyir sa bcu'i dbang phyug go /

analyzed: sa gcig rang bzhin rnams kyis ni //

original: sbyin sogs pha rol phyin pa gang //
analyzed: sbyin sogs pha rol phyin pa gang //

analyzed: lhan skyes yang dag byang chub nyid //

original: thams cad kyi ni nang son pas //
analyzed: thams cad kyi ni nang son pas //

original: rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug ma mchog /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug ma mchog /

analyzed: bshad dang ma bshad gang ci'ang rung //

original: de kun byang chub tshul can no //
analyzed: de kun byang chub tshul can no //

original: slar yang bya rog dbyibs lha mo //
analyzed: slar yang bya rog dbyibs lha mo //
translated: Again, the goddess with the shape of a crow,

analyzed: de nas byed pa'i gzugs can ma'o //

original: byed pa phyogs kyi gnas la ste //
analyzed: byed pa phyogs kyi gnas la ste //

original: rtsa gnas kun gyi bu ga 'o //
analyzed: rtsa gnas kun gyi bu ga 'o //

original: thim dang de las langs bsam gtan //
analyzed: thim dang de las langs bsam gtan //

original: khva gdong ming du 'du shes so //
analyzed: khva gdong ming du 'du shes so //

original: de ltar rnal 'byor gter thams cad //
analyzed: de ltar rnal 'byor gter thams cad //

analyzed: bla ma'i zhal las gsal 'thob 'gyur // bla ma @105a *//

original: gang de mi brnyas shing //

analyzed: de phyir rtag tu las nyams pa //

analyzed: sngon byas sdig pa'i las kyis te //

original: nyams 'gyur bstan pa 'di la ni //
analyzed: nyams 'gyur bstan pa 'di la ni //

analyzed: bgrod bya sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur //

analyzed: dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las //

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog @107b rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs //

original: de nas gzhan ni don che ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan ni don che ba //
translated: Now, the other one, which is of great significance,

analyzed: khyi gdong rgyu yi dbye bshad bya //

analyzed: gang zhig rnam par shes tsam gyis //
translated: by mere knowledge of which

analyzed: rnal 'byor rnams kyi mchog 'grub 'gyur //

analyzed: rang gis 'jug dang 'byung bar 'gyur //

analyzed: bdag nyid kyis ni bde reg 'gyur //

analyzed: brgya la nyi shus lhag pa ni //

analyzed: nges tshig bstan bya'i mtshan nyid do //

analyzed: de ltar khyi yi ming du ni //

analyzed: su ra'i btung  la 'thung  'gyur dang // skyed mos tshal dang rdzing bu'i 'gram //

analyzed: bsti gnas 'gro ba la sogs @108a *//

analyzed: kyis; ;tshim dang ston mo 'dod pa ltar //

analyzed: bla ma'i gsung ni bde chen po //

analyzed: mi dang mi mo'i sgeg pa dang // rgod dang sgeg pa'i bya ba gang //

analyzed: mkhas pa rnams kyi yid dam pa //

analyzed: skye bo dbang phyug nyid du'o //

analyzed: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la //

analyzed: mchod dang phyag byed la sogs pas //

analyzed: bla ma gus las bde ba ste //

analyzed: yon dbul ba dang bud med do //

original: spyod lam la sogs chos rnams la //
analyzed: spyod lam la sogs chos rnams la //

analyzed: las thams cad la mi 'jug go /

original: rgol ba rnams ni gzhom pa dang // sangs rgyas chos rnams gzhag pa dang // rnal 'byor ma dang bza' btung dang // sgom dang dga' ba bskyed pa dang // dbang po gnyis kyi bdag nyid skyes //

analyzed: sbyin sogs pha rol phyin rnams kyi //

analyzed: byang chub lam la gnas pa yi //

analyzed: lus la ltos pa med pa yis //

analyzed: de ltar gnas skabs gcig pa'o //

original: gnyis pa slar yang bshad par bya //
analyzed: gnyis pa slar yang bshad par bya //

analyzed: don dam rnams la gsal ba yis //

analyzed: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gnas su //

analyzed: de nyid rtogs pa'i ming can no //

analyzed: rtog pa po yi tshig bzung nas //

analyzed: sprul pa dang ni chos sku'i yang //

analyzed: gang phyir srid mtshor kun spang bya //

analyzed: lhag ma dga' ba bzhi bo ni; ;smon lam rdzogs ldan la sogs la //

analyzed: sems can gsum ldan la phra skyes //

analyzed: rig pa des la sbom bo skyes //

analyzed: gnyis ldan la ni bde ba med //

analyzed: rtsod dus cha yi rags pa'o //

original: thams cad sangs rgyas yon tan thob //
analyzed: thams cad sangs rgyas yon tan thob //

analyzed: smon lam gyis ni rang gi 'bras // de ltar bde skabs rnams kyis @109a *//

analyzed: ni; ;sum cu rtsa gnyis rmad byung che //

analyzed: gnas skabs gsum pa'i bde ba la //

analyzed: khams bcu drug tu shes par bya //

analyzed: rang bzhin skyes par gyur pa gsal //

original: sman dang 'dra bar shes par bya //
analyzed: sman dang 'dra bar shes par bya //

analyzed: pad can dung dang sna tshogs can //

analyzed: glang po ma dang bung ba'i ming //

analyzed: 'khor lo rdo rje skya snar ma //

analyzed: du ba mo dang bu skye tshe //

analyzed: dmar po de bzhin sprul gyi mig /

analyzed: khab sogs byed pa'i skad cig las //

analyzed: bya ba de dag zhar la dran //

original: sgom pa'i skad cig mthar 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: sgom pa'i skad cig mthar 'gro ba'o //

analyzed: gnas skabs bzhi la bshad pa ni; ;yid can rnams kyi grangs brgyad de //

analyzed: bde ba'i rgyu yi gnas skabs so //

analyzed: de ltar gnas skabs rnam bzhi la /

original: yang dag dran pa'i go 'phang 'dir //

analyzed: gang dang su yir gnas par 'gyur //

analyzed: yang dag rtsol ba la gnas nas /

analyzed: sngags 'dren sbyor ba bdag nyid de //

analyzed: sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid sngags //

analyzed: chu stod kar ka ta yugs sa //
translated: The one born in the northern Kuru is

analyzed: rang gi bdag po rab gnas ma //

analyzed: dbang gi las la lha mo ste //

analyzed: dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las //
translated: From the union of all heroes,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs //

original: bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so //

original: zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las //
translated: This is the glorious Ocean of Dakas, the great king of yoginl tantras.

original: khyi gdong ma'i mtshan nyid dang / bde ba la sogs pa'i gnas skabs kyi cho ga ste le'u ste dgu pa'o ////🔽de nas bag gdong ma yi ni //
analyzed: khyi gdong ma'i mtshan nyid dang / bde ba la sogs pa'i gnas skabs kyi cho ga ste le'u ste dgu pa'o //// de nas bag gdong ma yi ni //

original: lung  ba  rgya cher bshad par bya //
analyzed: lung  ba  rgya cher bshad par bya //
translated: Now, the extensive explanation of Kshitigati🔽is the entry into all things

original: dngos po kun la rab 'jug dang // dngos po de las ldog pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po kun la rab 'jug dang // dngos po de las ldog pa'o //

original: phag mo rengs @110a *//
analyzed: phag mo rengs @110a *//

original: pa'i las rnams la //
analyzed: pa'i las rnams la //
translated: The actions of the four activities

original: mi shes ri bo 'joms ma'o //
analyzed: mi shes ri bo 'joms ma'o //

original: s'u; khab ni rdo rje'i gdong de yang //
analyzed: s'u; khab ni rdo rje'i gdong de yang //
translated: The needle is the face of the vajra,

original: skud pa bzhin du kun 'gro ma //
analyzed: skud pa bzhin du kun 'gro ma //

original: byang chub sems kyi dga' chen po; ;ka; keng rus bdud rtsi 'byin pa mo //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi dga' chen po; ;ka; keng rus bdud rtsi 'byin pa mo //

original: de'i rang bzhin 'dod chags sogs kun //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin 'dod chags sogs kun //

original: bzhi pa las 'das mi 'gyur ma //
analyzed: bzhi pa las 'das mi 'gyur ma //

original: de nas lha mo chen mo brgyad //
analyzed: de nas lha mo chen mo brgyad //

analyzed: mngal sogs bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid de //
translated: are the characteristics that generate the womb, and so forth.

original: thog mar bya rog bzhin sa bon //
analyzed: thog mar bya rog bzhin sa bon //

analyzed: ma yi padma la ltung ba'o //
translated: falls into the mother’s lotus.

original: nub gcig gis ni phye ba yis //
analyzed: nub gcig gis ni phye ba yis //

original: phye nas 'ug par gnas dang 'dra //
analyzed: phye nas 'ug par gnas dang 'dra //

original: zla ba gcig tu gnas nas ni //
analyzed: zla ba gcig tu gnas nas ni //

original: khyi yi dbugs ni 'phel ba las //
analyzed: khyi yi dbugs ni 'phel ba las //

original: phag tu'ang yan lag bdag nyid can //
analyzed: phag tu'ang yan lag bdag nyid can //

original: brtan mas skye gnas dral ba las //
analyzed: brtan mas skye gnas dral ba las //

original: pho nya byis pa dang 'che phyis //
analyzed: pho nya byis pa dang 'che phyis //

analyzed: mche ba mo ni las bcom pas //

original: 'joms ma byang chub yan lag dgyes //
analyzed: 'joms ma byang chub yan lag dgyes //

original: dngos grub kun gyi 'bras 'byung ma //
analyzed: dngos grub kun gyi 'bras 'byung ma //

original: yang dag pa yi rtsol ba 'di //🔽gzhan gyi lta ba nya sogs kyi //
analyzed: yang dag pa yi rtsol ba 'di // gzhan gyi lta ba nya sogs kyi //

analyzed: 'jug pa thams cad bden pa ste; ;'jug med de dngos spyod yul lo // rkang gnyis rkang bzhi la sogs pa'i //
translated: but the non-activity is the object of the real practice.🔽The limbs of effort of the two-legged, four-legged, and so on,

original: rtsol ba'i yan lag 'jog ma 'o //
analyzed: rtsol ba'i yan lag 'jog ma 'o //
translated: are not placed.

original: mthong ba dang ni reg pas kyang //
analyzed: mthong ba dang ni reg pas kyang //

original: 'jug med de nyid rtag tu'o; ;kha dog ser mo drag chen mo //
analyzed: 'jug med de nyid rtag tu'o; ;kha dog ser mo drag chen mo //

original: lhag ma gzugs can ma dang mtshungs //
analyzed: lhag ma gzugs can ma dang mtshungs //

original: rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
analyzed: rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //

original: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin can //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin can //

original: seng ge gro bzhin chu @110b srin la //
analyzed: seng ge gro bzhin chu @110b srin la //

original: nye ba'i gling du gnas pa mo //
analyzed: nye ba'i gling du gnas pa mo //

original: sngags las bzhengs pa'i lha mo rnams //
analyzed: sngags las bzhengs pa'i lha mo rnams //

original: rang rang zhing dang nye zhing ma'o //
analyzed: rang rang zhing dang nye zhing ma'o //

original: aom ba dam dzra sht'a s'u ka ka r'a r'a lo sy'a gra ye mu h'um kha h'um bhi pha sha ta n'a pha ya ta h'um sv'a h'um h'a pha aom ta phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom ba dam dzra sht'a s'u ka ka r'a r'a lo sy'a gra ye mu h'um kha h'um bhi pha sha ta n'a pha ya ta h'um sv'a h'um h'a pha aom ta phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ badam jraṣṭāsuka karā rāloṣyā grāye muṃ khaṃ bhi phaśaṇā phaya taṃ huṃ svā haṃ hā pha oṃ ta phaṭ svāhā.

original: sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid kyis //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid kyis //

original: gtso mo mchog gi rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: gtso mo mchog gi rnal 'byor ma //

original: dkyil 'khor thig gdab la sogs ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thig gdab la sogs ni //

analyzed: bsgoms pa'i sbyar ba'i ma yi ste //

original: thig chen gnyis ni btab nas su //
analyzed: thig chen gnyis ni btab nas su //

analyzed: shar dang so sor 'dod thig dang // zur gyi thig gnyis btab byas nas //

analyzed: phur bu'ang gdab par bya ba ste //

original: tshangs pa'i thig gi logs nas ni //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i thig gi logs nas ni //

analyzed: sum cu rtsa gnyis pa gnyis gdab //

analyzed: sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha ste //

analyzed: ste ba'i padma de dang mnyam //

original: snying po'i 'dab ma'i ngos nas ni //
analyzed: snying po'i 'dab ma'i ngos nas ni //

analyzed: cha gsum du yang de shes bya //

analyzed: de yi cha gcig 'khor lo gsum //

analyzed: lhag ma mtshon gyi sa gzhi'o //

original: de yi sum cha phreng ba ste //
analyzed: de yi sum cha phreng ba ste //

original: rdo rje padma dang 'khor lo //
analyzed: rdo rje padma dang 'khor lo //

analyzed: rtsibs rnams 'khor lo dbus ma las //

original: ka pa rnams ni kun tu sbyin //
analyzed: ka pa rnams ni kun tu sbyin //

analyzed: brgyad gsum 'khor lo gsum du'o //

original: sgo las sum 'gyur rta babs te //
analyzed: sgo las sum 'gyur rta babs te //

analyzed: sgo khyud sgo yi cha can no // stegs bu rnams ni de'i phyed de //

analyzed: 'gram du logs ni de bzhin no // gzungs kyi snam bu dang ni 'dir //

analyzed: rin chen phreng phyed snam bu'o //

analyzed: mgo bo'i phreng ba de yi phyed //

analyzed: 'thon rtse mo //

analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje 'od chen po'o //

analyzed: dril chung dra ba gos rnams dang // ba dan dril bu sgra sgrogs pa'o //

analyzed: snying po la sogs yang dag bri //

analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng dang 'dir //

analyzed: lhag mar 'bar ba'i phreng ba'o //

original: de yi phyi rol khor yug ni //
analyzed: de yi phyi rol khor yug ni //
translated: The outer rim is

analyzed: mgo dang lag pa dag de bzhin //

analyzed: rin chen phreng ba yang dag bri //

analyzed: dur khrod brgyad po bri bya ste //

analyzed: sa bon rnam par dgod par bya //

analyzed: phyi nas las ni yang dag brtsam //

analyzed: las kyi rdo rje 'joms byas nas //

analyzed: de yi steng du bdun bdun te //

analyzed: phyi nas gsum ni gzhag par bya //

analyzed: g-yas su khyi dang lce spyang dang // byi la stag dang seng ge dang; ;'jigs phyed mche can rta bong bu //

analyzed: de ltar ji ltar rim pas so //

original: g-yon du ba lang ma he spyang //
analyzed: g-yon du ba lang ma he spyang //

analyzed: srin bya dang ni ngur ba dang // rma su  zangs kyi gtsug phud can //

analyzed: phug ron 'di rnams thams cad la //

analyzed: rang bzhin mdog tu 'dod par bya //

analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyis bya nges par ni //

analyzed: rang bzhin gang gi khams la'o //

original: yon tan sum cu gsum bdag ni //
analyzed: yon tan sum cu gsum bdag ni //

original: rang bzhin gyis ni 'dzin par 'gyur //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis ni 'dzin par 'gyur //

original: de yi gzugs brnyan gyi ni zhal //
analyzed: de yi gzugs brnyan gyi ni zhal //

analyzed: 'gro la byang chub byed bdag nyid //

original: zhabs rnams kyis ni 'byung po'i @112a *//
analyzed: zhabs rnams kyis ni 'byung po'i @112a *//
translated: the hosts of bhūtas,

analyzed: g-yas pas khyab 'jug drag po dang // tshangs pa nyi ma me dang ni //

analyzed: dbang po rlung dang bden bral dang // gnod sbyin ji lta'i rim pa'o //
translated: Indra, Vāyu, Nirṛti, and Yakṣa, in order.🔽With his left [hand] he holds Yama, Kāma,🔽Candra, Varuṇa, Kubera, Pṛthivī, Gaṇeśa,

original: g-yon pa gshin rje 'dod pa dang // zla ba chu lha nor rgyas dang // sa dang tshogs kyi bdag po dang // smin drug bu dang 'khor bsgyur te //
analyzed: g-yon pa gshin rje 'dod pa dang // zla ba chu lha nor rgyas dang // sa dang tshogs kyi bdag po dang // smin drug bu dang 'khor bsgyur te //

original: de ltar bco brgyad dbyibs rnams ni //
analyzed: de ltar bco brgyad dbyibs rnams ni //
translated: Thus, the eighteen shapes

original: 'dus pa rmad byung ba sngags pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus pa rmad byung ba sngags pa'o //
translated: are the marvelous assembly of the mantra practitioner.

original: 'dzin 'gyur rang gi sems kyis ni //
analyzed: 'dzin 'gyur rang gi sems kyis ni //
translated: One should grasp them with one’s own mind.

original: lha mo'i zhabs ni rdo rje 'dzin //
analyzed: lha mo'i zhabs ni rdo rje 'dzin //
translated: The goddess's feet are Vajradhara.

original: g-yas par mtshon cha'i tshogs kyang ni //
analyzed: g-yas par mtshon cha'i tshogs kyang ni //

original: rdo rje ral gri mdung dbal can //
analyzed: rdo rje ral gri mdung dbal can //
translated: has a vajra, sword, and spear,

original: dgra sta gri gug mda' dang ni //
analyzed: dgra sta gri gug mda' dang ni //
translated: an axe, flaying knife, arrow,🔽stake, club, hammer,🔽discus, battle-axe, sword,🔽stick, and single-pointed spear.

original: gsal shing phub dang tho ba dang // 'khor lo da ru chu gri dang // dbyug pa dang ni mtshon rtse gcig /
analyzed: gsal shing phub dang tho ba dang // 'khor lo da ru chu gri dang // dbyug pa dang ni mtshon rtse gcig /

original: dung dang zangs dung dbyug gu dang // rma bya'i mjug ma de bzhin te //
analyzed: dung dang zangs dung dbyug gu dang // rma bya'i mjug ma de bzhin te //
translated: crow feather, and brush,🔽fire pit, mountain,🔽stick, mirror, lute,

original: bya rog sgro dang pir dang ni //
analyzed: bya rog sgro dang pir dang ni //
translated: lungs, liver, heart,🔽illusion, Rāhu, fetters,🔽scales, shackles, and a net,🔽a severed head, a torch, and a skull,🔽and a terrifying form, in order.

original: me yi thab dang ri bo dang // dbyug pa me long pi wang dang // rkang mgo lag pa glo ba dang; ;sgyu ma sgra gcan lcags sgrog dang // gdos dang sgrog dang nya rgya dang // mgo bcad 'bar ba mar nag dang // 'jigs byed gzugs te rim pas so //🔽g-yon par dril bu phub rings mche //
analyzed: me yi thab dang ri bo dang // dbyug pa me long pi wang dang // rkang mgo lag pa glo ba dang; ;sgyu ma sgra gcan lcags sgrog dang // gdos dang sgrog dang nya rgya dang // mgo bcad 'bar ba mar nag dang // 'jigs byed gzugs te rim pas so // g-yon par dril bu phub rings mche //
translated: On the left, a bell, stake, and a swift flaying knife,🔽a hammer, noose, and skull-cup,

original: tho ba zhags pa thod pa dang // gzhu dang kha tv'am ga po ti //
analyzed: tho ba zhags pa thod pa dang // gzhu dang kha tv'am ga po ti //
translated: and a bow, khaṭvāṅga, and a poți.

analyzed: phub chung yu can sdigs mdzub dang // g-yer ka'i phreng dang lcags sgrog dang // brag dang dur khrod @112b rdul dang ni //
translated: the garland of bells, the iron chain, the rock, the charnel ground dust,🔽the wet elephant hide, the hanging locks of hair,🔽the staff, the corpse-tree branch, the rock, the shield, the head,

original: bho kam da ka lpags rlon dang // skra yi thag pa 'phyang ba dang // skul byed ro yi shing bu dang // brag dang phub dang mgo bo dang // keng rus zor pa de bzhin te //
analyzed: bho kam da ka lpags rlon dang // skra yi thag pa 'phyang ba dang // skul byed ro yi shing bu dang // brag dang phub dang mgo bo dang // keng rus zor pa de bzhin te //
translated: the thighbone, and likewise the shoulder-blade,🔽the eye, the kidney, the liver,🔽the spleen, the heart, the seed, the saw,🔽the needle, the body skin,

original: mig dang mkhal ma gnye ma dang // spen pa dang ni phur pa dang // sa bon gang dang sog le dang // khab dang lus kyi pags pa dang // sprin cher 'bab dang shing ral gri /
analyzed: mig dang mkhal ma gnye ma dang // spen pa dang ni phur pa dang // sa bon gang dang sog le dang // khab dang lus kyi pags pa dang // sprin cher 'bab dang shing ral gri /
translated: the great cloud, and the sword tree.

original: de ltar rim pas shes byas pas //🔽bdun cu rtsa gnyis rgyud kyi rtsa'o //
analyzed: de ltar rim pas shes byas pas // bdun cu rtsa gnyis rgyud kyi rtsa'o //
translated: Thus, having understood the sequence,🔽the nāḍīs of the seventy-two tantras

original: gnyis lhag pa yi phyag gnyis kyis //
analyzed: gnyis lhag pa yi phyag gnyis kyis //
translated: are the two extra hands

original: glang po'i pags pa steng bgos pa'o //
analyzed: glang po'i pags pa steng bgos pa'o //
translated: that wear an elephant skin on the upper body.

original: khams gsum glang po la bzhugs pa //
analyzed: khams gsum glang po la bzhugs pa //
translated: The elephant of the three realms is mounted

original: dral ba bgegs ni bcom pa'o //
analyzed: dral ba bgegs ni bcom pa'o //
translated: and the obstacles are destroyed.

original: kun gyi kha dog rang bzhin te //
analyzed: kun gyi kha dog rang bzhin te //
translated: The colors of all are natural.

original: yang na gtso mo'i kha dog bzhin //
analyzed: yang na gtso mo'i kha dog bzhin //
translated: Or else, like the color of the principal one.🔽All the garlands of heads and so forth,

original: mgo bo'i phreng sogs thams cad dang // gos dang rgyan rnams lus skyes pa'o; ;de ltar yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'i //
analyzed: mgo bo'i phreng sogs thams cad dang // gos dang rgyan rnams lus skyes pa'o; ;de ltar yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'i //

original: gzugs brnyan can mar shes par bya //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan can mar shes par bya //
translated: Thus, one should know the reflection,🔽by means of right effort.

original: yang dag dran pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: yang dag dran pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
translated: By means of the nature of right mindfulness,

original: dngos dbye rkang gnyis bdag nyid do //
analyzed: dngos dbye rkang gnyis bdag nyid do //
translated: the nature of the two-footed one is differentiated.

original: ting 'dzin dra bas kun bkang nas //
analyzed: ting 'dzin dra bas kun bkang nas //
translated: Having filled everything with the net of samādhi,

original: 'od gsal ba la kun thim byos //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba la kun thim byos //
translated: dissolve everything into the clear light.

original: rtogs nas sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur //
analyzed: rtogs nas sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur //
translated: Having realized, one attains buddhahood.

original: sna tshogs dud 'gro sogs skye'o //🔽rang rang skad kyis chos kyang ni //
analyzed: sna tshogs dud 'gro sogs skye'o // rang rang skad kyis chos kyang ni //
translated: One is born as various animals and so forth.🔽One will teach the Dharma to those born from one’s own speech

original: rang rig skyes la ston par 'gyur //
analyzed: rang rig skyes la ston par 'gyur //
translated: with one’s own speech.

original: s'u yi yi ges 'gro kun rgyas btab ste //
analyzed: s'u yi yi ges 'gro kun rgyas btab ste //
translated: All beings are sealed by the syllable sū,

original: lhan skyes rang bzhin de nyid dran par bya //
analyzed: lhan skyes rang bzhin de nyid dran par bya //
translated: and one should recall that very connate nature.

original: slar yang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'ong ngo //🔽phyugs gang yin @113a *//
analyzed: slar yang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'ong ngo // phyugs gang yin @113a *//
translated: Again, the suffering of saṃsāra does not come.

original: pa'i skye bo rnams sangs rgyas //
analyzed: pa'i skye bo rnams sangs rgyas //
translated: The beings who are cattle are buddhas.

original: dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor bas //
analyzed: dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor bas //

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs //

original: bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so //🔽dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las /
analyzed: bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so // dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las /

original: phag gdong ma bskyed pa dang / dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa la sogs pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o ////
analyzed: phag gdong ma bskyed pa dang / dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa la sogs pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o ////
translated: This concludes the tenth chapter of the glorious “Ocean of Dakas,” the great king of tantras.

original: de nas brtan pa'i sbyor ba 'dir //
analyzed: de nas brtan pa'i sbyor ba 'dir //
translated: Now, in this context, the stable union

original: bshad kyi sgom pa po rnams nyon //
analyzed: bshad kyi sgom pa po rnams nyon //
translated: is explained; so listen, you meditators!

original: kun nas dus ni bzhi rnams su //
analyzed: kun nas dus ni bzhi rnams su //
translated: In the four times altogether,

original: zla ba gsum gsum pa ni bzhi //🔽bgrod dang mnyam pas bcings pa yi //
analyzed: zla ba gsum gsum pa ni bzhi // bgrod dang mnyam pas bcings pa yi //
translated: there are four sets of three months.🔽The junctions are explained as

original: mtshams de rnams ni rab bshad bya //🔽byang du bgrod pa la sogs pa //
analyzed: mtshams de rnams ni rab bshad bya // byang du bgrod pa la sogs pa //
translated: the equinoctial and solstitial points.🔽The stable ones, such as Dakini,

original: brtan ma la sogs mtshams gnas ma //
analyzed: brtan ma la sogs mtshams gnas ma //
translated: reside at the junctions of the northern passage, etc.

original: nye ba'i gling du gnas pa mo //
analyzed: nye ba'i gling du gnas pa mo //
translated: They reside in the subcontinents,

original: mgo yi zla ba dang ni gzhu //
analyzed: mgo yi zla ba dang ni gzhu //
translated: in the head months, and in the lunar mansions.

original: mo hi ta ni rtag tu de'i //
analyzed: mo hi ta ni rtag tu de'i //
translated: Mohita is always known

original: las gnyis dag tu shes bya ste //
analyzed: las gnyis dag tu shes bya ste //
translated: as the two actions.

original: sgom po rnams kyi dus min pa'i //
analyzed: sgom po rnams kyi dus min pa'i //

original: 'chi ba mche bas gcod ma gang //
analyzed: 'chi ba mche bas gcod ma gang //

original: de yis gshin rje'i mcher shes bya //
analyzed: de yis gshin rje'i mcher shes bya //

original: thog mar yi ge gnyis can no //
analyzed: thog mar yi ge gnyis can no //
translated: First, it has two syllables.

original: bcom ldan dus min 'chi ba ni //
analyzed: bcom ldan dus min 'chi ba ni //
translated: Bhagavat, how does untimely death

original: mi rnams la ni ji ltar 'byung //
analyzed: mi rnams la ni ji ltar 'byung //
translated: occur for humans?

original: gang gis drin gyis bdag rig 'gyur //
analyzed: gang gis drin gyis bdag rig 'gyur //

original: su zhig bdag la sprul par 'gyur //
analyzed: su zhig bdag la sprul par 'gyur //
translated: Who will manifest for me?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
translated: The Bhagavat replied:

original: brtan ma dus min 'chi ba ni //
analyzed: brtan ma dus min 'chi ba ni //

original: sems can rang rang las @113b kyis so //🔽skye bo kun la 'tshe ba yi //
analyzed: sems can rang rang las @113b kyis so // skye bo kun la 'tshe ba yi //

original: sdig gang bdag nyid kyis byas pa //
analyzed: sdig gang bdag nyid kyis byas pa //
translated: Whatever sin I have committed🔽against all beings,

original: de yis de ni dus min 'chi //
analyzed: de yis de ni dus min 'chi //
translated: by that I have untimely death.

original: khams dang dbugs ni 'chad par 'gyur //
analyzed: khams dang dbugs ni 'chad par 'gyur //

original: gzhan rnams kyis ni bcad pa yis //
analyzed: gzhan rnams kyis ni bcad pa yis //

original: bza' btung phyin ci log tu 'gyur //
analyzed: bza' btung phyin ci log tu 'gyur //

original: sbyin pa rnyed pa dang bcas sbyin //
analyzed: sbyin pa rnyed pa dang bcas sbyin //

original: dus min gyis ni nyams mi 'gyur //
analyzed: dus min gyis ni nyams mi 'gyur //
translated: do not give untimely.

original: sbyin pa rnam pa gnyis su bshad //
analyzed: sbyin pa rnam pa gnyis su bshad //
translated: Giving is explained as twofold:

original: lus dang bsam pa las kyang ngo //
analyzed: lus dang bsam pa las kyang ngo //

original: g-yon gyi sna yi sgo ru ni //
analyzed: g-yon gyi sna yi sgo ru ni //
translated: At the door of the left nostril,

original: zla ba rgyu ba'i rim pa yis //
analyzed: zla ba rgyu ba'i rim pa yis //
translated: By the stages of the moon’s movement,🔽

original: bgrod pa'i srog ni nyi ma'i ste //
analyzed: bgrod pa'i srog ni nyi ma'i ste //
translated: The life-force of the movement is the sun.

original: aa ba dh'u t'i'i rlung rim pas //
analyzed: aa ba dh'u t'i'i rlung rim pas //
translated: The wind of the avadhūtī

original: de yis ya yi yi ge bshad //
analyzed: de yis ya yi yi ge bshad //
translated: explains the syllable ya.

original: ma yi yi ge dbus 'bab ma'o //
analyzed: ma yi yi ge dbus 'bab ma'o //
translated: The syllable ma is the downward-moving wind.

original: h'a yig g-yas su song nas ni //
analyzed: h'a yig g-yas su song nas ni //
translated: The syllable ha, having gone to the right,

original: re zhig dbus ma rgyu bar 'gyur //
analyzed: re zhig dbus ma rgyu bar 'gyur //
translated: moves in the middle for a while.

original: aa yi yi ges gnas pa 'thob //
analyzed: aa yi yi ges gnas pa 'thob //

original: slu ba nam mkhar 'gro ba mo //
analyzed: slu ba nam mkhar 'gro ba mo //
translated: The deceiving one moves in space.

original: rtsa ni bde kun bdag nyid rnams //
analyzed: rtsa ni bde kun bdag nyid rnams //
translated: The channels are all the natures of bliss.

original: dhi yi yi ge'i ming du shes //
analyzed: dhi yi yi ge'i ming du shes //
translated: The syllable dhi is known as the name.

original: mdor bsdus pa yi yi ge ni //
analyzed: mdor bsdus pa yi yi ge ni //
translated: The syllable in brief

original: dkyil 'khor lnga rnams su ni brjod //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor lnga rnams su ni brjod //

original: de rnams dngos las khyab bskyed de //
analyzed: de rnams dngos las khyab bskyed de //
translated: From those things, the pervasion is generated.

original: dus min blu bar rig par bya //
analyzed: dus min blu bar rig par bya //
translated: One should know that the deceiving [wind] moves in space.

original: de ltar bsod nams gcig nyid po //
analyzed: de ltar bsod nams gcig nyid po //
translated: Thus, the single merit

original: gnas gnas bgrod pa'i lus can no //
analyzed: gnas gnas bgrod pa'i lus can no //
translated: is the body that moves to the places.

original: 'chi ba zhes 'di rnam rtog ste //
analyzed: 'chi ba zhes 'di rnam rtog ste //
translated: This is called “death,” a concept

original: mkha' spyod go 'phang 'khrid par 'gyur //
analyzed: mkha' spyod go 'phang 'khrid par 'gyur //
translated: that leads to the state of Khecara.

original: 'dir ni kha dog gnyis su 'gyur //
analyzed: 'dir ni kha dog gnyis su 'gyur //
translated: Here, there are two colors,

original: lus sgom pa ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: lus sgom pa ni de bzhin no //
translated: and likewise, the body is visualized.

original: ji ltar mkha' 'gro ma'i rim pas //
analyzed: ji ltar mkha' 'gro ma'i rim pas //
translated: And in the sequence of the dakinis,

original: mtshan ma mtshon cha sogs 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshan ma mtshon cha sogs 'gyur ro //

original: spong ba'i chos zhes bya bar gsungs //🔽dkyil 'khor @114a *//
analyzed: spong ba'i chos zhes bya bar gsungs // dkyil 'khor @114a *//
translated: This is said to be the Dharma of abandonment.🔽In the center of the mandala

original: dbus kyi gtso mo'o //
analyzed: dbus kyi gtso mo'o //
translated: Is the principal goddess.

original: rnal 'byor sum cu bdun bdag nyid //
analyzed: rnal 'byor sum cu bdun bdag nyid //
translated: The nature of the thirty-seven yogas,

original: sngags las byung ba'i bdag nyid kyis //
analyzed: sngags las byung ba'i bdag nyid kyis //
translated: With the nature arisen from mantra,

original: aom a'a:sa h'um ha ba sra dzra bhu ya dza ma bh'a d'a su dhi r'a k'a ya yee h'um h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat phat sv'a sv'a h'a h'a h'a aom/
analyzed: aom a'a:sa h'um ha ba sra dzra bhu ya dza ma bh'a d'a su dhi r'a k'a ya yee h'um h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat phat sv'a sv'a h'a h'a h'a aom/
translated: Oṃ āḥ saṃ hūṃ ha vaṃ saṃ jraṃ bhuṃ yaṃ maṃ bhāṃ dāṃ suṃ dhīṃ rāṃ kāṃ ye hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ phaṭ phaṭ svā svā hā hā hā oṃ.

original: 'di ni shes rab thabs bdag nyid //🔽rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo'i gtso //
analyzed: 'di ni shes rab thabs bdag nyid // rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo'i gtso //
translated: This is the nature of wisdom and method,🔽The principal of yoginīs and heroes,

original: gshin rje mche ba'i rab sbyor bas //
analyzed: gshin rje mche ba'i rab sbyor bas //
translated: The application of the fangs of Yamarāja.

original: skye ba mthar byed bza' bar bya //
analyzed: skye ba mthar byed bza' bar bya //
translated: One should eat to the end of birth.

original: dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las //
analyzed: dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las //
translated: From the union of all heroes,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs //
translated: The vajra dakini tathāgata,

original: bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so //
translated: Was spoken by the blessed lord.

original: zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las //🔽gshin rje brtan ma'i rnam par gzhag pa dang // bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las // gshin rje brtan ma'i rnam par gzhag pa dang // bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is the chapter on the characteristics of the creation of the messengers of Yama, the eleventh chapter of the great yoga tantra of the glorious Ocean of Dakas.🔽Chapter Twelve

original: le'u bcu gcig pa'o ////
analyzed: le'u bcu gcig pa'o ////
translated: The Procedure of the Mandala of the Assembly of the Great Heroes🔽The Mandala of the Assembly

original: de nas gshin rje pho nya 'chang //
analyzed: de nas gshin rje pho nya 'chang //
translated: Now, the mandala of the assembly of the great heroes will be explained.

analyzed: gang gis 'chi ba dbang 'gyur ba'o // bri shtsi ka ru yang dag byung // smin drug can dang bzang por ldan // dpyid kyis mnyam pa'i dus kyis ni //

analyzed: pho nya ma bskyed mtshan nyid do //
translated: The mandala of the assembly of the great heroes is the mandala of the assembly of the heroes.

analyzed: gshin rje gsod pa de yi ni // 'chi ba blu ba'i 'khor lo la //
translated: The mandala of the assembly of the great heroes is the mandala of the assembly of the heroes.🔽The mandala of the assembly of the great heroes is the mandala of the assembly of the heroes.

original: rtsi bas bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo cher //🔽lan gsum du ni bskor bar bya //
analyzed: rtsi bas bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo cher // lan gsum du ni bskor bar bya //
translated: The mandala of the assembly of the great heroes is the mandala of the assembly of the heroes.

original: lnga rnams nyi shu rtsa lngar ni //🔽bcu gsum par ni bri bar bya //🔽slar yang sum cu gnyis rnams su //
analyzed: lnga rnams nyi shu rtsa lngar ni // bcu gsum par ni bri bar bya // slar yang sum cu gnyis rnams su //

original: dus tshod me dang gnyis zla ba //
analyzed: dus tshod me dang gnyis zla ba //
translated: The time is the fire and the two moons.

original: zla ba'o tshes phyogs de bzhin mnga'//
analyzed: zla ba'o tshes phyogs de bzhin mnga'//
translated: The moon is the lunar mansion, and likewise the sun.

original: gsum gnyis gcig gi skabs su ni //
analyzed: gsum gnyis gcig gi skabs su ni //
translated: In the period of three, two, and one,

original: rim pas phyi nas nyi phyed sogs //
analyzed: rim pas phyi nas nyi phyed sogs //
translated: in order, after that, the sun, the moon, and so forth.

original: nyi ma gcig dang zhag dang gnyis //
analyzed: nyi ma gcig dang zhag dang gnyis //
translated: One day of the sun, two days,

original: gsum bzhi sa dang nyi ma phyogs //
analyzed: gsum bzhi sa dang nyi ma phyogs //
translated: three, four, earth, and sun-direction,

original: nor ro chu phyogs rim pas te //
analyzed: nor ro chu phyogs rim pas te //
translated: wealth, water-direction, in order,

original: sum cu bdun bdag nyid gsal ba'o //
analyzed: sum cu bdun bdag nyid gsal ba'o //
translated: thirty, and the nature of the self is clear.🔽One should know the power of life,

original: srog gi nus par shes bya ba; ;bcu dgu yi ni bdag nyid do //
analyzed: srog gi nus par shes bya ba; ;bcu dgu yi ni bdag nyid do //

original: bcu dgu slar yang 'di ru ni //
analyzed: bcu dgu slar yang 'di ru ni //

original: 'joms pa'i bdag nyid nus can no //
analyzed: 'joms pa'i bdag nyid nus can no //
translated: is the powerful nature of destruction.

original: nyi mar bdun po mnyam son par //
analyzed: nyi mar bdun po mnyam son par //
translated: When the seven arrive in the sun,

original: skye ba'i skar ma dang zla ba //
analyzed: skye ba'i skar ma dang zla ba //
translated: the birth star and the moon

original: gcig tu spyod par rtag rgyu las //
analyzed: gcig tu spyod par rtag rgyu las //
translated: always move together,

original: rgyas pa'i dus ni yang dag 'thob //
analyzed: rgyas pa'i dus ni yang dag 'thob //

original: bar gyi nyi ma rnams nyid ni //
analyzed: bar gyi nyi ma rnams nyid ni //

original: bcu drug grangs su shes bya la //
analyzed: bcu drug grangs su shes bya la //
translated: should be known as the number sixteen.

original: bdun cu rtsa gnyis rim pa yis //
analyzed: bdun cu rtsa gnyis rim pa yis //

original: lo yi rim pas yang dag sbyor //
analyzed: lo yi rim pas yang dag sbyor //

original: de phyir pho nya'i lha mo yang //
analyzed: de phyir pho nya'i lha mo yang //
translated: Therefore, the messenger goddess

original: dkyil 'khor bdag nyid can bsgom bya //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bdag nyid can bsgom bya //
translated: One should meditate on the essence of the maṇḍala.

original: gang du rtsa ni srog spangs pa //
analyzed: gang du rtsa ni srog spangs pa //

original: der ni 'di de 'bab par bya //
analyzed: der ni 'di de 'bab par bya //

original: steng du yal 'dab steng rtsa ba //
analyzed: steng du yal 'dab steng rtsa ba //

original: gsang ba yis ni dbugs bya ba'o //
analyzed: gsang ba yis ni dbugs bya ba'o //

original: de ni mnyam pa mtshams kun te //
analyzed: de ni mnyam pa mtshams kun te //

original: mnyam pa ya yig gis 'gugs ma'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa ya yig gis 'gugs ma'o //

original: de nas gnad bcings pas nyams pa //
analyzed: de nas gnad bcings pas nyams pa //
translated: Then, by binding the vital points, one is impaired,

original: ma yi yi ges thams cad bshad //
analyzed: ma yi yi ges thams cad bshad //
translated: All is explained by the syllable ma.

original: 'og dang steng du bskyod byas nas //
analyzed: 'og dang steng du bskyod byas nas //

original: rnon po'i me ni rab sbar bya //
analyzed: rnon po'i me ni rab sbar bya //

original: nad rnams dang ni sdig mang rnams //
analyzed: nad rnams dang ni sdig mang rnams //

original: las kyi rang nyid nyams par 'gyur //
analyzed: las kyi rang nyid nyams par 'gyur //

original: der ni sbyin pa sbyin bya @115a *//
analyzed: der ni sbyin pa sbyin bya @115a *//

original: ste; ;ba lang ma he zhon sogs so //
analyzed: ste; ;ba lang ma he zhon sogs so //

original: byang chub sems kyis lam du ni //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyis lam du ni //

original: mdzes ma rnams kyi de tshe btung //🔽der yang rang gi yan lag las //
analyzed: mdzes ma rnams kyi de tshe btung // der yang rang gi yan lag las //

original: byung ba'i sna sman btang bar bya //
analyzed: byung ba'i sna sman btang bar bya //

original: 'o ma dang mnyam bza' bya ste //
analyzed: 'o ma dang mnyam bza' bya ste //

original: glo ba la sogs ma tshos pa'o //🔽g-yul ngo rang nyid 'gyel ba yi //🔽gal te rnyed na khrag chen po //
analyzed: glo ba la sogs ma tshos pa'o // g-yul ngo rang nyid 'gyel ba yi // gal te rnyed na khrag chen po //

analyzed: the tshom spangs nas btung bya zhing //

original: de yi sha yang bza' bar bya //
analyzed: de yi sha yang bza' bar bya //

original: yang na gang gi sa gnas su //
analyzed: yang na gang gi sa gnas su //

original: 'chi ltas zad nas song bar du //
analyzed: 'chi ltas zad nas song bar du //
translated: one has gone after the signs of death are exhausted,

original: bza' ba'o mas byas na bde //
analyzed: bza' ba'o mas byas na bde //
translated: one should eat the flesh,

original: yang na sha rnams thams cad do //
analyzed: yang na sha rnams thams cad do //
translated: or else all the flesh.🔽Having completely covered

analyzed: gos 'jam rnams kyis yongs g-yogs nas // bdag nyid la ni dus kun tu // der ni gnas pa bsre bya zhing //

original: me dang lhan cig nges gnas bya //
analyzed: me dang lhan cig nges gnas bya //
translated: in that place, together with the fire.

original: der ni chu dron kyang btung zhing //
analyzed: der ni chu dron kyang btung zhing //
translated: One should drink hot water there,

original: bza' ba chung ngu nyung ngu'o //
analyzed: bza' ba chung ngu nyung ngu'o //

original: gshin rje'i pho nya bsgom bya ste //
analyzed: gshin rje'i pho nya bsgom bya ste //

original: sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid rang //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid rang //

original: gsang sngags kha sbyor bdag nyid can //
analyzed: gsang sngags kha sbyor bdag nyid can //
translated: having the nature of the union of the secret mantra,

original: ser dmar gnyis kyi kha dog can //
analyzed: ser dmar gnyis kyi kha dog can //

original: ser pos 'chi ba rengs par byed //
analyzed: ser pos 'chi ba rengs par byed //

original: dmar pos dbang du 'gugs par byed //
analyzed: dmar pos dbang du 'gugs par byed //

original: lhan skyes rdzogs byang chub dngos kyi //
analyzed: lhan skyes rdzogs byang chub dngos kyi //

original: lte 'og mgrin pa rkan 'gro rnams //
analyzed: lte 'og mgrin pa rkan 'gro rnams //

original: zab pas srog ni gzhan 'gro ba //
analyzed: zab pas srog ni gzhan 'gro ba //

original: phan tshun bug rnams su 'du 'gyur //
analyzed: phan tshun bug rnams su 'du 'gyur //

original: de phyir kha tv'am ga sgom ste //
analyzed: de phyir kha tv'am ga sgom ste //

original: yan lag kha tv'am sbyor bas so //
analyzed: yan lag kha tv'am sbyor bas so //
translated: is with the limbs of the khatvānga union.🔽In the center of the lotus of the heart,

original: snying ga'i pad dbus su sems @115b kyis; ;dkyil 'khor sngon cha'i cha can no //
analyzed: snying ga'i pad dbus su sems @115b kyis; ;dkyil 'khor sngon cha'i cha can no //
translated: the mind is the mandala with the previous parts.

original: lha mo'i mdog ni sngon can te //
analyzed: lha mo'i mdog ni sngon can te //
translated: The color of the goddess is blue,

original: dbyibs sogs gzugs can ma dang mtshungs //
analyzed: dbyibs sogs gzugs can ma dang mtshungs //

analyzed: aom ba badzra ra ya shu ma p'a d'u shva t'i dya ye t'a h'um sh'u h'um la phat kha phat tv'am sv'a ga h'a dh'a ni ni h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a aom h'um/
translated: oṃ vajra-raṃ-śu-mā-pāda-ū-śva-tī-dyaya-te āṃ śūṃ hūṃ la phaṭ kha phaṭ taṃ svāhā gahā dhani ni hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā oṃ hūṃ

original: shes rab thabs bdag nyid du skyes //
analyzed: shes rab thabs bdag nyid du skyes //

original: sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rang bzhin can //
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rang bzhin can //
translated: the nature of Mahāmāyā,

original: rnal 'byor ma ni 'di rnams kun //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma ni 'di rnams kun //

original: bdud rtsi'i gzugs su bsgom par bya //
analyzed: bdud rtsi'i gzugs su bsgom par bya //

original: de rnams snying gar dkar ba ni //
analyzed: de rnams snying gar dkar ba ni //

original: 'khor lo thams cad rnam bsgom bya //
analyzed: 'khor lo thams cad rnam bsgom bya //

original: de rnams nang du rang ming yang //
analyzed: de rnams nang du rang ming yang //

original: kha dog dkar mo 'od bcas pa //🔽rtsa yi bu ga so so yi //
analyzed: kha dog dkar mo 'od bcas pa // rtsa yi bu ga so so yi //

original: nang du'ang rnam par bsgom par bya //
analyzed: nang du'ang rnam par bsgom par bya //

original: rlon dang btsos pa'i ra'i 'o ma //
analyzed: rlon dang btsos pa'i ra'i 'o ma //
translated: Drinking the milk of a live or cooked

original: bdud rtsi lnga dang rang byung ni //
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga dang rang byung ni //
translated: goat, the five nectars, and the naturally arisen,

original: rdo rje'i rtse mos 'thungs pas kyang //
analyzed: rdo rje'i rtse mos 'thungs pas kyang //
translated: with the tip of the vajra,

original: dus su 'chi ba nyams par 'gyur //
analyzed: dus su 'chi ba nyams par 'gyur //
translated: one will overcome untimely death.

original: zag med de nyid thob pas na //
analyzed: zag med de nyid thob pas na //
translated: Since one attains the uncontaminated state,

original: de la dus min 'chi ming ci //🔽de phyir yang dag rab spong ba'i //
analyzed: de la dus min 'chi ming ci // de phyir yang dag rab spong ba'i //
translated: what is called “untimely death” in that case?🔽Therefore, one should know that the messengers of the Lord of Death

original: chos nyid gshin rje'i pho nyar shes //
analyzed: chos nyid gshin rje'i pho nyar shes //
translated: are the dharmatā that abandons the utterly pure.

original: rdo rje btung byas rab bshad pa //
analyzed: rdo rje btung byas rab bshad pa //
translated: The vajra drink is explained

original: las kyis rnam pa gnyis su 'dod //
analyzed: las kyis rnam pa gnyis su 'dod //

original: gcig ni phyi rol gyir bshad de //
analyzed: gcig ni phyi rol gyir bshad de //
translated: One is explained as external,

original: gnyis po nang gi bdag nyid 'dod //
analyzed: gnyis po nang gi bdag nyid 'dod //
translated: and the second is asserted to be internal.

original: rdo rje rtse gsum bsgom bya ba //
analyzed: rdo rje rtse gsum bsgom bya ba //
translated: One should visualize the three-pointed vajra

original: rtsa drug dus ni rgyu ba mo //
analyzed: rtsa drug dus ni rgyu ba mo //
translated: as the six nāḍīs that move in the time.

original: dang pa'i rgyu bar 'dzin pa'i srog /
analyzed: dang pa'i rgyu bar 'dzin pa'i srog /
translated: The life-force that is grasped as the cause of the pure

original: 'og gi chu ni 'thung ba yi //
analyzed: 'og gi chu ni 'thung ba yi //
translated: is the water below that is drunk.

original: bdud rtsi lnga sogs gang cung zad //
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga sogs gang cung zad //
translated: Whatever there is, such as the five amṛtas,

original: de yi dbus su rab tu zhugs //
analyzed: de yi dbus su rab tu zhugs //
translated: it enters into the middle of that.

original: 'thungs pas rgas dang 'chi ba 'bros //🔽rdo rje 'chang @116a *//
analyzed: 'thungs pas rgas dang 'chi ba 'bros // rdo rje 'chang @116a *//
translated: By drinking it, old age and death are destroyed.

original: gi gdams ngag go /
analyzed: gi gdams ngag go /
translated: This is the instruction of Vajradhara.

original: gshin rje pho nya ma yi rnal 'byor ma khyod bzhugs //
analyzed: gshin rje pho nya ma yi rnal 'byor ma khyod bzhugs //
translated: You, the messenger of Yama, the yoginī, remain.

original: de yis slar yang rgas dang 'chi ba med pa 'thob //
analyzed: de yis slar yang rgas dang 'chi ba med pa 'thob //
translated: By that, again, one obtains immortality.

original: 'chi ba slong bar byed pa'i rnal 'byor ma bla med //
analyzed: 'chi ba slong bar byed pa'i rnal 'byor ma bla med //
translated: The yoginī who raises up death is unsurpassed.

original: rnal 'byor ma la sdig dang bsod nams mi ldan no //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma la sdig dang bsod nams mi ldan no //
translated: The yoginī is neither sinful nor meritorious.

original: de ni mnyam pa'o mnyam srog las //
analyzed: de ni mnyam pa'o mnyam srog las //
translated: That is the equality of the equal life-force.

original: g-yon dang g-yas dang dbu ma yi //
analyzed: g-yon dang g-yas dang dbu ma yi //
translated: From the left, right, and middle🔽effort, from the unmoving entity,

original: rtsol ba g-yo med dngos po las; ;slar yang ya ma'i yi ge 'dod //
analyzed: rtsol ba g-yo med dngos po las; ;slar yang ya ma'i yi ge 'dod //
translated: again the syllable ya is desired.

original: pho nya phyogs gnyis kyi ngang pa //
analyzed: pho nya phyogs gnyis kyi ngang pa //
translated: The messenger is in the two directions.

original: dbu mar zad pa'i go 'phang ngo //
analyzed: dbu mar zad pa'i go 'phang ngo //
translated: The stage of exhaustion is in the central nāḍī.

original: de ltar rnam pa mang po ni //
analyzed: de ltar rnam pa mang po ni //
translated: Thus, the many kinds

original: brtan pa'i blo ldan gyis mtshon bya //
analyzed: brtan pa'i blo ldan gyis mtshon bya //
translated: are indicated by the wise.

original: 'dir mang bshad pas ci bya ste //
analyzed: 'dir mang bshad pas ci bya ste //
translated: What is the use of speaking much here?

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin sogs pa //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin sogs pa //
translated: The perfection of generosity and so forth

original: dge ba'i las kyang bsnyen bya ste //
analyzed: dge ba'i las kyang bsnyen bya ste //
translated: should be attended to as virtuous actions.

original: lus gcig lus mang po can no //🔽rnal 'byor ma la mchod bya zhing //
analyzed: lus gcig lus mang po can no // rnal 'byor ma la mchod bya zhing //
translated: One body, many bodies.🔽One should worship the yoginīs

original: dpa' bo rnams la rjed par bya //
analyzed: dpa' bo rnams la rjed par bya //
translated: and honor the heroes.

original: gang zhig gang slong la yang dag /
analyzed: gang zhig gang slong la yang dag /
translated: Whatever is requested by whomever

original: de phyir de rnams la nges sbyin //
analyzed: de phyir de rnams la nges sbyin //
translated: should definitely be given to them.

original: dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las //
analyzed: dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las //
translated: From the union of all heroes and yoginīs,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /
translated: the supreme bliss of Vajrasattva,

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs //
translated: the vajra dakini, the tathāgata,

original: bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so //🔽zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las /
analyzed: bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so // zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las /
translated: the blessed lord has spoken this.

original: gshin rje pho nya mo bskyed pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / 'chi ba blu ba'i 'khor lo sgom pa'i man ngag mdor bsdus pa ste le'u bcu gnyis pa'o ////
analyzed: gshin rje pho nya mo bskyed pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / 'chi ba blu ba'i 'khor lo sgom pa'i man ngag mdor bsdus pa ste le'u bcu gnyis pa'o ////
translated: This is the twelfth chapter on the characteristics of generating the messenger of Yāminī and so forth, and the concise instruction for meditating on the wheel of deceiving death, from the great king of yoginī tantras, the glorious Ocean of Dakas.

original: de nas gshin @116b rje mche gtsigs ma //
analyzed: de nas gshin @116b rje mche gtsigs ma //
translated: Then, the one with the fangs of Yāminī,

original: bshad kyi da ni mnyan par gyis //
analyzed: bshad kyi da ni mnyan par gyis //
translated: I will explain it now, so listen!

original: sems can rnams kyi bag chags kyi //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi bag chags kyi //
translated: The faults of beings’ latent tendencies

original: skyon gyis gur la 'bigs dang sreg /
analyzed: skyon gyis gur la 'bigs dang sreg /
translated: are like being pierced and burned by a thorn.

original: gang zhig gang la las byas pas //
analyzed: gang zhig gang la las byas pas //
translated: Whatever action is done to someone,

original: de yi dus su 'bigs par 'dod //
analyzed: de yi dus su 'bigs par 'dod //
translated: at that time it is considered a piercing.

original: brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gnad rnams ni //
analyzed: brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gnad rnams ni //
translated: The eighty-four vital points

original: gang dang der ni gnas rnams kyang //
analyzed: gang dang der ni gnas rnams kyang //
translated: are where the channels are located.

original: 'di rnams dbus su bya ba ste //
analyzed: 'di rnams dbus su bya ba ste //
translated: These are the middle ones,

original: dge dang dman pa mtshon par bya //
analyzed: dge dang dman pa mtshon par bya //
translated: indicating virtue and inferiority.

original: mi dge ba ni 'chir dogs pas //
analyzed: mi dge ba ni 'chir dogs pas //
translated: Since nonvirtue is feared at death,

original: gnad du na bas mtshon par bya //
analyzed: gnad du na bas mtshon par bya //
translated: it is indicated by pain in the vital points.

original: gal te dus ni gcig la ni //
analyzed: gal te dus ni gcig la ni //
translated: If at one time

original: rkan gsum du ni gzer pa na //
analyzed: rkan gsum du ni gzer pa na //
translated: the three palate [channels] are pierced,

original: de tshe zhag gsum na 'chi bar //
analyzed: de tshe zhag gsum na 'chi bar //
translated: then after three days🔽one should know that death is certain.🔽If the soles of the feet are pierced

original: rig bya 'di la the tshom med; ;rkang pa'i brang bar gzer ba dang // gal te lte bar gzer ba ni //
analyzed: rig bya 'di la the tshom med; ;rkang pa'i brang bar gzer ba dang // gal te lte bar gzer ba ni //
translated: and the navel is pierced,🔽then after two days

original: lha mo zhag gnyis na 'chi bar //🔽skye bo rnams ni 'gyur ba 'o //
analyzed: lha mo zhag gnyis na 'chi bar // skye bo rnams ni 'gyur ba 'o //

analyzed: deng sang skye bo tshe thung la //

analyzed: bsod nams grangs med ma byas par //

analyzed: slar yang ye shes smra ba ci //

analyzed: byang chub sems ci sangs rgyas ci //

analyzed: dngos po rtogs phyir sangs rgyas dang // de dngos byang chub sems dpa' rang //

analyzed: phung po dang ni sangs rgyas lhan cig zungs //

analyzed: brjod med kun la'ang nan tan byos //

analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma sogs 'joms mtha' yi //

analyzed: gshin rje la sogs khro ba @121a *//

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs //

analyzed: bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so //

original: gshin rje 'joms ma 'jug pa bskyed pa dang / dus su 'chi ba blu ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi gnas skabs kyi rang bzhin te le'u bcu bzhi pa'o ////

translated: This is the fourteenth chapter on the procedure of the rite of the subjugation of death, the generation of the Yamari cycle, and the nature of the state of buddhahood, from the great yoga tantra of the ocean of dakinis, the glorious Sri Cakrasamvara.🔽CHAPTER 15

original: de nas 'di las gsang chen bshad //
analyzed: de nas 'di las gsang chen bshad //

original: yang dag ting 'dzin mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: yang dag ting 'dzin mtshan nyid do //

analyzed: dpal he ru kar gnas gang gis //

original: gus bcas las gzhan la yod min //
analyzed: gus bcas las gzhan la yod min //

original: 'jig pa la sogs chags pa'i mthar //
analyzed: 'jig pa la sogs chags pa'i mthar //

analyzed: thog mar gnas ni kun bsgrub bya //

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ni dmigs par bya //

analyzed: shr'i yig 'byung ba kun gyi don //

analyzed: phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid 'dod //

analyzed: 'di dag kun rdzob gzugs dang ni //
translated: All of these are the form of the relative🔽and the ultimate bliss that is free from engagement,

original: 'jug med bde ba'i mtha' can dang // ae wam la sogs gnyis med pa'ang //
analyzed: 'jug med bde ba'i mtha' can dang // ae wam la sogs gnyis med pa'ang //

original: shr'i zhes bya ba'i yig des brjod //
analyzed: shr'i zhes bya ba'i yig des brjod //

original: he yig snying ga nas kun tu //
analyzed: he yig snying ga nas kun tu //

original: he ru ka sogs rang 'khor 'gro /
analyzed: he ru ka sogs rang 'khor 'gro /

original: sgom pa kun gyi 'byung gnas las //
analyzed: sgom pa kun gyi 'byung gnas las //

analyzed: 'dzin pa la sogs rnam bskyed 'gyur //

original: de ni rgyu stong bdag nyid de //
analyzed: de ni rgyu stong bdag nyid de //
translated: That is the cause, the nature of emptiness,

original: rgyu bdag nyid du mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu bdag nyid du mi rtog pa'o //

original: rang bzhin chos bdag med pa nyid //
analyzed: rang bzhin chos bdag med pa nyid //

original: de ni stong pa'i rnal 'byor gnas //
analyzed: de ni stong pa'i rnal 'byor gnas //

original: bkod pa gang zag bdag med pa //
analyzed: bkod pa gang zag bdag med pa //

original: rtog pa'i dra ba chen po ni //
analyzed: rtog pa'i dra ba chen po ni //

original: ru yig rkyen gyi bdag nyid can //
analyzed: ru yig rkyen gyi bdag nyid can //
translated: is the syllable ru, which is the nature of conditions.

original: de ni bdag gi bkod bral ba'o; ;slar brjod ka ni ma lus pa'i //
analyzed: de ni bdag gi bkod bral ba'o; ;slar brjod ka ni ma lus pa'i //

analyzed: bdag gis gnyis byar med shes gang //

original: gang phyir ci la'ang mi gnas pa //
analyzed: gang phyir ci la'ang mi gnas pa //

original: de phyir ka zhes bya bar brjod //
analyzed: de phyir ka zhes bya bar brjod //

analyzed: dngos po mngon sum stong pa min; ;dngos po tsam gyi rang bzhin can //

original: dpal he ru ka gnas lha mo //
analyzed: dpal he ru ka gnas lha mo //

analyzed: snga nas sgom pa kun 'gro ba'o //

analyzed: snying la padma'i nyi dbus su //

analyzed: 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa //

analyzed: spyan gsum phyag ni bcu gnyis pa //

analyzed: bdag la mchog gi don gyis 'dod pa mdzod //

analyzed: de ltar 'khor lo kun la bya //

analyzed: de yi phyi rol zlum por sbyin //

analyzed: re mo gnyis ni gnag dang sngo //

analyzed: sgo dang rta babs kha khyer dang // dra ba dra ba phyed pas mdzes //

analyzed: shar gyi sgo yi dbus su yang //

analyzed: byang du 'ug pa'i gdong can ma //

analyzed: kha dog l'a ma sogs 'dra mchog /

analyzed: me dang bden bral rlung dang ni //

analyzed: dbang ldan mtshams na gnas pa mo //

analyzed: gshin rje brtan ma pho nya mo // mche gcigs 'joms ma rim ji bzhin // kha dog gnyis gnyis mnyam par bya //

analyzed: zhal ni rjes su mthun rim pas //

analyzed: shar dang byang dang nub dang ni //

original: lho yi sa gzhi rtag pa ru //
analyzed: lho yi sa gzhi rtag pa ru //

analyzed: gnag dang sngo dang ljang dang dmar //

original: ser po yi ni mdog tu bya //
analyzed: ser po yi ni mdog tu bya //

analyzed: lhan skyes dkyil 'khor de bzhin du //

original: gang phyir 'khor lo rim pa bzhi //
analyzed: gang phyir 'khor lo rim pa bzhi //

analyzed: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa //

analyzed: mjug tu bya'o rim ji bzhin //

analyzed: 'khor lo gnyis par ri mo gsum //

analyzed: gsum pa la ni ri mo bzhi //

analyzed: bzhi pa ri mo lnga'i bdag nyid //

original: dur khrod kun nas rim pas te //
analyzed: dur khrod kun nas rim pas te //

original: phyi rol la sogs sa gzhi ni //
analyzed: phyi rol la sogs sa gzhi ni //

analyzed: zlum po'i dbyibs su bya bar 'dod //

original: 'khor lo ri mo lnga'i bdag nyid //
analyzed: 'khor lo ri mo lnga'i bdag nyid //

analyzed: grva bzhi pa la kun tu 'bar //

analyzed: de la lhan skyes 'khor lo yi //

analyzed: dur khrod rnams ni bshad bya ste //

analyzed: gtum drag tshang tshing de bzhin du // 'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i keng rus can //

analyzed: 'jigs sde shar la sogs pa yi //

original: phyogs su g-yon skor yongs su gnas //
analyzed: phyogs su g-yon skor yongs su gnas //

original: aatta ttara rgod dbang ldan du //
analyzed: aatta ttara rgod dbang ldan du //

original: rlung du ki li ki li sgrogs //
analyzed: rlung du ki li ki li sgrogs //

original: @127a *// dur khrod drag po'i gzugs rnams ni //
analyzed: @127a *// dur khrod drag po'i gzugs rnams ni //

analyzed: ro langs 'byung po ce sbyang sgra // rim pa 'di yis gnas pa ste //

analyzed: dur khrod brgyad po rnams su yang; ;shing dang phyogs skyong klu dbang ste //

analyzed: shir shing khyab nas kam ka li //

analyzed: tsu ta'i shing dang n+ya gro dha //

original: de bzhin ka ranydza ka nyid //
analyzed: de bzhin ka ranydza ka nyid //

analyzed: la t'a par ka ti dang pi tha ba // dbang po nor sbyin de bzhin du // klu dbang dang ni gshin rje'i bdag /

original: dbang ldan de nas sreg za dang // srin po'i dbang po rlung bdag po //
analyzed: dbang ldan de nas sreg za dang // srin po'i dbang po rlung bdag po //

analyzed: nor rgyas 'jog po de bzhin du //

original: stobs kyi rgyu dang padma nyid //
analyzed: stobs kyi rgyu dang padma nyid //

analyzed: pad chen hu lu hu lu dang // rigs ldan dang ni dung skyong ngo // sgrogs pa dang ni 'ur sgrogs dang // drag po 'khyil pa mthug de bzhin //

original: gang pa char 'bebs gtum po ste //
analyzed: gang pa char 'bebs gtum po ste //

original: 'di rnams sprin gyi bdag po 'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams sprin gyi bdag po 'o //

original: 'dir ni dur khrod thams cad la //
analyzed: 'dir ni dur khrod thams cad la //

original: rdo rje phreng ba rnam par sbyin //
analyzed: rdo rje phreng ba rnam par sbyin //

original: thams cad kyang 'dir de bzhin bya //
analyzed: thams cad kyang 'dir de bzhin bya //

original: phyi dang nang du 'dod pa yin //
analyzed: phyi dang nang du 'dod pa yin //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gsum pa yon tan gyi 'khor lo'o //

analyzed: de nas phyi rol nam mkha' yi //

original: sum cu drug rtsibs dbus su yang //
analyzed: sum cu drug rtsibs dbus su yang //

analyzed: mi'am ci mo dri za mo //

analyzed: hu tu ka ma p'a ta ba ma de bzhin du //

analyzed: pi wang gling bu mu kun da ma dang // rdza rnga ma dang nges par gag ga ri //

analyzed: dam ru ma dang d'un d'u ki de bzhin // zangs dung ma dang rva dung ma de bzhin //

analyzed: 'khor ma mchog gi dbang phyug mo //

analyzed: 'khor lo kun gyi cod pan la //

analyzed: ji lta rgyan la sogs mang po //

analyzed: 'khor lo kun tu spyan gsum dang; ;phyogs kyi gos 'chang rdzas 'gro ma'o //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i 'khor lo ste dang po'o //

analyzed: de nas phyi rol rlung 'khor lo //

analyzed: sngon po sna tshogs pa yi mdog /

analyzed: dbus sbyin bya ba //

analyzed: rnal 'byor ma rnams rim ji bzhin //

analyzed: blo dang ldan pas shes par bya //

analyzed: rma bya zangs kyi gtsug phud ma // gu dbu li 'jam pa mo //

analyzed: phug ron bya rog chen mo dang // ga di ni dang gong ma sreg /

analyzed: ne tso sngags ma bzhad mo dang // bya rgod 'ug pa mchil pa mo //

analyzed: shing bye'u mo dang ngur pa ma // briksha ra n'i ka kak 'i //

analyzed: so bya mo dang byi la mo // lcug ma'i mgrin dang s'a ri mo //

analyzed: khra mo gur gum lce can ma //

analyzed: hor mo kam ka mo de bzhin //

analyzed: datda ri mo ri dvags dgra /

analyzed: de ltar rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo //

analyzed: 'khor lo'i sa gzhi gang 'dra'i mdog /

original: yang na rang rang las shes bya //
analyzed: yang na rang rang las shes bya //

original: phyag sogs de bzhin sngon dang mtshungs //
analyzed: phyag sogs de bzhin sngon dang mtshungs //

original: thams cad shes rab thabs bdag nyid //
analyzed: thams cad shes rab thabs bdag nyid //

original: 'dun sa ni la gnas ma mchog /
analyzed: 'dun sa ni la gnas ma mchog /

analyzed: sbyong dka'i sar ni shes bya ste //

original: gling ni bzhi pa mar 'dod do //
analyzed: gling ni bzhi pa mar 'dod do //

analyzed: de nas phyi rol gyi bshad bya //

analyzed: 'khor los yi ming @128b can mchog /

original: kha dog ser po'i rang bzhin la //

analyzed: rnal 'byor ma ni sum cu drug /

analyzed: sa spyod ma rnams rim ji bzhin // seng mo stag mo bhimbha ri bod ma //

analyzed: glang che ri dvags byi la mo // ba dang ma he mo rta mo //

analyzed: ce sbyang mo dang bse mo 'bri //

analyzed: de nas de yi phyi rol 'chad //

analyzed: ral gri sen mo rab med ma //

analyzed: grul bum mo ste lha mo che //

analyzed: shes bya rang gi gzugs can no //

analyzed: de la @132a *//

analyzed: nye ba'i dur khrod dang // de nas sa ni chos kyi sprin //

analyzed: kun 'gro 'khor lo can du 'dod //

analyzed: de nas phyi rol du gzhan pa //

analyzed: bzod ma mi bzod ma ngal ma //

analyzed: las ni thams cad byed lha mo //

analyzed: rang bzhin 'khor lo 'di che'o //

analyzed: kha dog rang gi 'khor lor grags //

analyzed: shes rab thabs bdag nyid lha mo //

analyzed: bcu gnyis pa la bshad pa ste // ye shes mkha' 'gro ma sogs kyi //

analyzed: mchod sogs lha mor 'dod pa yin //

original: kun tu 'od kyi sa yin no //
analyzed: kun tu 'od kyi sa yin no //

analyzed: de ltar ye shes sogs sku'i mtha'//

analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi kha dog can //

analyzed: tshad med dge @133a *//

analyzed: ba'i 'khor sgyur ma //

analyzed: dge rgyas ma dang sprin med ma // bsod nams skyes ma'i 'khor lo dang // 'bras bu che ba'i 'khor sgyur ma //

analyzed: mi che mi gdung 'khor lo ma; ;shin tu mthong ma bzang snang ma //

original: 'og min ma yi 'khor sgyur ma //
analyzed: 'og min ma yi 'khor sgyur ma //

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched ma //
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched ma //
translated: The sphere of infinite space,

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched ma //
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched ma //
translated: The sphere of infinite consciousness,

original: ci yang med pa'i skye mched ma //
analyzed: ci yang med pa'i skye mched ma //
translated: The sphere of nothingness,

original: 'du shes 'du shes med min ma //
analyzed: 'du shes 'du shes med min ma //
translated: The sphere of neither perception nor non-perception,

original: dmyal mo yi dvags ma de bzhin //
analyzed: dmyal mo yi dvags ma de bzhin //

original: dud 'gro mi mo lha min mo //🔽gzhal med khang spyod ma de bzhin //
analyzed: dud 'gro mi mo lha min mo // gzhal med khang spyod ma de bzhin //

original: zla ba nyi ma gshin rje mo //
analyzed: zla ba nyi ma gshin rje mo //

original: dbang mo 'khor sgyur mar shes bya //
analyzed: dbang mo 'khor sgyur mar shes bya //

original: rang gi 'khor lo'i mdog bzhin bya //
analyzed: rang gi 'khor lo'i mdog bzhin bya //

analyzed: phyag dang mtshon cha sngar bzhin no //

original: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin te //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin te //

original: nye ba'i grong mthar yang dag gnas //
analyzed: nye ba'i grong mthar yang dag gnas //

original: sa ni mos pa spyod pa ste //
analyzed: sa ni mos pa spyod pa ste //

original: 'di rnams 'khor lo bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: 'di rnams 'khor lo bcu gnyis so //

original: dkyil 'khor 'di ni gru bzhi ste //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'di ni gru bzhi ste //

original: sprul pa'i skur ni 'du shes so //
analyzed: sprul pa'i skur ni 'du shes so //

original: ri mo lnga ni me long sogs //
analyzed: ri mo lnga ni me long sogs //

original: thams cad mtshan nyid kyis mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad mtshan nyid kyis mtshan pa'o //

original: brgyad gnyis lha mos byas pa yi //
analyzed: brgyad gnyis lha mos byas pa yi //

analyzed: mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi la'o //

original: phyi rol dur khrod brgyad rnam ste //
analyzed: phyi rol dur khrod brgyad rnam ste //

original: sgo skyong ma ni rim ji bzhin //
analyzed: sgo skyong ma ni rim ji bzhin //

analyzed: shar du chu skyes dkar mo bsgom // byang du gandha ri ma 'o //

original: nub tu rdo rje gar ma ste //
analyzed: nub tu rdo rje gar ma ste //

original: lho ru rta rgod ma yi kha //
analyzed: lho ru rta rgod ma yi kha //

original: grva yi char ni lha mo bzhi //
analyzed: grva yi char ni lha mo bzhi //

original: dbang ldan la sogs rim ji bzhin //
analyzed: dbang ldan la sogs rim ji bzhin //

analyzed: lha mo rdo rje 'bar @133b zhal dang // rdo rje khro gnyer ma'i zhal dang // rdo rje 'thub ma gtum mo ste //

analyzed: kha dog la sogs sngon bzhin no //

original: drag mo chen mo gtsigs ba'i zhal //
analyzed: drag mo chen mo gtsigs ba'i zhal //

original: 'bar ba'i phreng bas rnam mdzes ma'o; ;dpa' bo rnams kyi mdog dang gzugs //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i phreng bas rnam mdzes ma'o; ;dpa' bo rnams kyi mdog dang gzugs //

original: rnal 'byor ma kun ji lta ba'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma kun ji lta ba'o //

analyzed: kun la mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan // dpa' bo rnams la dar phreng can //

original: ral pa'i cod pan pa da rnams //
analyzed: ral pa'i cod pan pa da rnams //

original: yan lag kun la thal bas bskus //
analyzed: yan lag kun la thal bas bskus //

original: rnal 'byor ma yi mtho zhing phreng //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi mtho zhing phreng //

original: lag gdub spyi gtsug brgyan pa dang // mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs //
analyzed: lag gdub spyi gtsug brgyan pa dang // mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs //

original: phag mo'i rigs las byung ba'o //
analyzed: phag mo'i rigs las byung ba'o //

original: dpa' bo kun gyi ming rnams ni //
analyzed: dpa' bo kun gyi ming rnams ni //

original: thog ma'i 'khor lo la sogs mchog /
analyzed: thog ma'i 'khor lo la sogs mchog /

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin du //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin du //

analyzed: sna tshogs padma mkha' 'gro dang // rin chen thod pa'i dum bu dang // keng rus chen po'i keng rus dang // mche ba rnam gtsigs lha dgra dang // 'od dpag med dang rdo rje 'od // rdo rje sku dang myu gu can //
translated: The one with bared fangs, the enemy of the gods,🔽Amitābha, and Vajraprabha,🔽Vajrakāya, and Aṅkura,

original: rdo rje ral pa can de bzhin //
analyzed: rdo rje ral pa can de bzhin //

original: dpa' chen rdo rje h'um mdzad dang // shin tu bzang dang rdo rje bzang //
analyzed: dpa' chen rdo rje h'um mdzad dang // shin tu bzang dang rdo rje bzang //

original: 'jigs byed chen po mig mi bzang //
analyzed: 'jigs byed chen po mig mi bzang //

analyzed: stobs chen rin chen rdo rje dang // rta mgrin nam mkha'i snying po dang // he ru ka dang / pad gar can //

original: rnam snang mdzad dang rdo rje sems //
analyzed: rnam snang mdzad dang rdo rje sems //

original: stobs chen ye shes mkha' 'gro dang // blo brtan thar dang ye shes dang // thabs dang thugs kyi rdo rje'o //
analyzed: stobs chen ye shes mkha' 'gro dang // blo brtan thar dang ye shes dang // thabs dang thugs kyi rdo rje'o //

original: lhag ma'i ming ni @134a *//
analyzed: lhag ma'i ming ni @134a *//
translated: The remaining names

original: lha mo bzhin //
analyzed: lha mo bzhin //

original: skyes bu'i rtags rnams su bya 'o //🔽'khor lo bcu gcig rnams kyi ni //
analyzed: skyes bu'i rtags rnams su bya 'o // 'khor lo bcu gcig rnams kyi ni //
translated: They are to be made into the signs of the person.🔽The doors and so forth of the eleven wheels

original: sgo la sogs pa'ang de bzhin no //
analyzed: sgo la sogs pa'ang de bzhin no //
translated: are also like that.

original: snying po'i padma'i lha mo rnams //
analyzed: snying po'i padma'i lha mo rnams //

original: gtso bos bdag po bzhin du bya //
analyzed: gtso bos bdag po bzhin du bya //
