original: 'on kyang bdag po sogs 'khor lor //🔽ji ltar bskal bzang rgyal ba ni //
analyzed: 'on kyang bdag po sogs 'khor lor // ji ltar bskal bzang rgyal ba ni //
translated: However, the lord and so forth in the wheel🔽are like the thousand buddhas of the fortunate eon,

original: bzhi yis dman pa'i stong phrag gcig /
analyzed: bzhi yis dman pa'i stong phrag gcig /

original: de rnams thams cad rnam bsgom bya //🔽mtshan ni yon tan dbye bas phye //
analyzed: de rnams thams cad rnam bsgom bya // mtshan ni yon tan dbye bas phye //
translated: All of them are to be visualized.

original: sprul pa'i sku can bdag nyid do //
analyzed: sprul pa'i sku can bdag nyid do //
translated: The names are distinguished by the divisions of qualities.🔽They are the nirmāṇakāyas.

original: gang zhig gang gi 'khor lo yi //
analyzed: gang zhig gang gi 'khor lo yi //
translated: The one who is in the wheel of which

original: rnal 'byor ma ni thog mar 'byung //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma ni thog mar 'byung //
translated: The yoginis are the first ones.

original: de yi bcu gnyis shes par bya //
analyzed: de yi bcu gnyis shes par bya //

original: kun spyod gnas dang nye gnas ma'o //
analyzed: kun spyod gnas dang nye gnas ma'o //
translated: The conduct, the abode, and the neighboring ones.

original: lhag ma sa ni bcu gsum pa //
analyzed: lhag ma sa ni bcu gsum pa //
translated: The remaining ones are the thirteen grounds.

original: sgo dang grva la sogs gnas ma'o //
analyzed: sgo dang grva la sogs gnas ma'o //

original: mchod dang bstod sogs dus su ni //
analyzed: mchod dang bstod sogs dus su ni //
translated: At the time of the offerings, praises, and so on,

original: thog mar rdo rje'i ming shes bya //
analyzed: thog mar rdo rje'i ming shes bya //

original: dpa' bo rnams la'ang de bzhin no //
analyzed: dpa' bo rnams la'ang de bzhin no //

original: phyi rol dur khrod bshad bya ba //
analyzed: phyi rol dur khrod bshad bya ba //

original: dang por tshig par shes bya ste //
analyzed: dang por tshig par shes bya ste //

original: gnyis par yang ni ma tshig pa //
analyzed: gnyis par yang ni ma tshig pa //

original: gsum pa dum bur gyur pa nyid //
analyzed: gsum pa dum bur gyur pa nyid //

original: bzhi pa yang ni ma gtugs pa //
analyzed: bzhi pa yang ni ma gtugs pa //

original: lnga pa 'jigs su rung bar bshad //
analyzed: lnga pa 'jigs su rung bar bshad //

original: drug pa yang ni 'jigs byed pa //
analyzed: drug pa yang ni 'jigs byed pa //

original: bdun pa gsal shing phug pa ste //
analyzed: bdun pa gsal shing phug pa ste //

original: steng nas btags pas brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: steng nas btags pas brgyad pa'o //

original: dur khrod brgyad por rtag tu ni //
analyzed: dur khrod brgyad por rtag tu ni //
translated: The eight charnel grounds are always

analyzed: dmyal srung chen po brgyad rnams so //

original: shal ma li shing mya ngan med //
analyzed: shal ma li shing mya ngan med //

original: yongs 'du au dum par de bzhin //
analyzed: yongs 'du au dum par de bzhin //

original: do mbi ra dang gambha ri //
analyzed: do mbi ra dang gambha ri //

original: rgya shug dang ni ba ru ra'o //
analyzed: rgya shug dang ni ba ru ra'o //

original: @134b sna tshogs ro langs tshogs dang ni //
analyzed: @134b sna tshogs ro langs tshogs dang ni //

original: rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo'i tshogs //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo'i tshogs //

original: mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod gzhan //
analyzed: mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod gzhan //

original: gang yin de las rdzu 'phrul che //
analyzed: gang yin de las rdzu 'phrul che //
translated: whatever they are, they are of great magic.

original: mgo med rgyug dang gzhan yang ni //
analyzed: mgo med rgyug dang gzhan yang ni //

analyzed: mgo bo med pa gar byed dang // nyal ba dang ni rkang med dang // mgo dang lus sogs gtubs pa ste //

original: ting 'dzin chen po'i rgyu yis ni //
analyzed: ting 'dzin chen po'i rgyu yis ni //

original: de rnams dga' byas gar byed pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams dga' byas gar byed pa'o //

original: de ltar de bzhin dbus su ni //
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin dbus su ni //
translated: In the same way, in the center,

original: sgyu skar sna tshogs bya ba yin //
analyzed: sgyu skar sna tshogs bya ba yin //

original: kha dog sna tshogs shes bya ste //
analyzed: kha dog sna tshogs shes bya ste //

original: gzhon pa gang gi yin pa 'o //
analyzed: gzhon pa gang gi yin pa 'o //

original: rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyu'i bdag nyid //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyu'i bdag nyid //

original: yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
analyzed: yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //

original: rgyu yi rdo rje ci 'dra ba //
analyzed: rgyu yi rdo rje ci 'dra ba //

original: yang ni de 'dra spro bar bya //
analyzed: yang ni de 'dra spro bar bya //
translated: one should emanate in that way.

original: dud 'gro'i zhal can lha mo ni //
analyzed: dud 'gro'i zhal can lha mo ni //
translated: The goddess with the face of an animal

original: las thams cad mas khyer nas 'ong //
analyzed: las thams cad mas khyer nas 'ong //

original: khro bo'i tshogs kyis mnyam bkug nas; ;sngon du bgegs ni bsal bar bya //
analyzed: khro bo'i tshogs kyis mnyam bkug nas; ;sngon du bgegs ni bsal bar bya //

original: sum bhas bka' bsgo rdo rje can //
analyzed: sum bhas bka' bsgo rdo rje can //

original: brtul zhugs can gyis phur gdab bya //🔽aom sumbha ni sumbha k'a ya k'am h'um h'um phat/
analyzed: brtul zhugs can gyis phur gdab bya // aom sumbha ni sumbha k'a ya k'am h'um h'um phat/
translated: The one with discipline should drive in the dagger.🔽Oṃ, Sumbha nisumbha kāya kāya, hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom gri han gri han p'a k'a tsi k'am h'um h'um phat/🔽aom gri han pa ya gri hn'a la ya tsitta si k'am h'um h'um phat/
analyzed: aom gri han gri han p'a k'a tsi k'am h'um h'um phat/ aom gri han pa ya gri hn'a la ya tsitta si k'am h'um h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ, gṛhaṇa gṛhaṇa pāka caka caka, hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ, gṛhṇāpaya gṛhṇālaya citta caka caka, hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom a'a na ya ho:/
analyzed: aom a'a na ya ho:/
translated: Oṃ, ānayahoḥ.

original: bha ga w'a na badzra dzny'a ni k'am h'um h'um phat/
analyzed: bha ga w'a na badzra dzny'a ni k'am h'um h'um phat/

original: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su gzhag /
analyzed: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su gzhag /
translated: One should place them in the east and so forth.

original: rdo rje gur gyi dbus su ni //
analyzed: rdo rje gur gyi dbus su ni //
translated: In the center of the vajra tent,

original: 'og tu rdo rje sa gzhir 'gyur //
analyzed: 'og tu rdo rje sa gzhir 'gyur //
translated: below, there is the vajra ground.

original: steng du mda' yi dra ba can //
analyzed: steng du mda' yi dra ba can //

original: rdo rje'i ra ba bla re'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i ra ba bla re'o //

original: chos kyi 'byung gnas nang du yang //
analyzed: chos kyi 'byung gnas nang du yang //
translated: Also within the source of phenomena,

original: de yang gsum bzhi lnga dang ni //
analyzed: de yang gsum bzhi lnga dang ni //
translated: that is threefold, fourfold, and fivefold.

original: grva drug pa ru bsgom @135a *//
analyzed: grva drug pa ru bsgom @135a *//

original: par bya // 'phar ma bzhi yi rim ji bzhin //
analyzed: par bya // 'phar ma bzhi yi rim ji bzhin //
translated: in the same order as the four corners.

original: rim pa thams cad 'dir dgod bya //
analyzed: rim pa thams cad 'dir dgod bya //
translated: All the stages are to be placed here.

original: aom gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya sarba dushta na phat/
analyzed: aom gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya sarba dushta na phat/

original: k'i la ya k'i la ya sarba p'a p'am phat/
analyzed: k'i la ya k'i la ya sarba p'a p'am phat/

original: h'um h'um h'um badzra k'i la ya badzra dha rod a'a dzny'a pa ya ti sarba bighnan k'a ya b'a ka tsitta badzra k'i la ya h'um phat/
analyzed: h'um h'um h'um badzra k'i la ya badzra dha rod a'a dzny'a pa ya ti sarba bighnan k'a ya b'a ka tsitta badzra k'i la ya h'um phat/
translated: hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ vajrakālaya vajradharo’jñāpayati sarvavidhān kāyavākcittavajrakālaya hūṃ phaṭ

original: phur bu gdab pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: phur bu gdab pa'i sngags so //
translated: This is the mantra for striking the dagger.🔽Oṃ vajra-muṇḍa vajrakālaya koṭaya hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom badzra mung+ga ra badzra k'i l'a ko ta ya h'um phat; brdungs pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: aom badzra mung+ga ra badzra k'i l'a ko ta ya h'um phat; brdungs pa'i sngags so //
translated: This is the mantra for striking.

original: de ltar 'khor lo kun dpa' bo //
analyzed: de ltar 'khor lo kun dpa' bo //
translated: Thus the wheel is the hero

original: bcom ldan rdo rje'i rigs 'byung ba'o //🔽sprul pa'i sku ni ma lus pa //
analyzed: bcom ldan rdo rje'i rigs 'byung ba'o // sprul pa'i sku ni ma lus pa //
translated: of the Vajra Family of the Blessed One.🔽The complete Nirmāṇakāya

original: rnal 'byor ma ni byang chub snod //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma ni byang chub snod //
translated: is the vessel of the yoginī’s enlightenment.

original: 'di ni sku'i 'khor lo sku gsum gyi bdag nyid dang / sprul pa dang / lhan cig pa ste gsum pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni sku'i 'khor lo sku gsum gyi bdag nyid dang / sprul pa dang / lhan cig pa ste gsum pa'o //
translated: This is the wheel of body, which is the nature of the three bodies, together with the emanations, the third.

original: de nas gnas dang nye gnas sogs //
analyzed: de nas gnas dang nye gnas sogs //
translated: Then the abodes and the neighboring abodes,

original: ji lta'i rim pa rnams gsungs pa //🔽gnas ni gang ba'i ri nyid dang // dra ba 'dzin dang audyan dang // aar bu da yang de bzhin gnas //
analyzed: ji lta'i rim pa rnams gsungs pa // gnas ni gang ba'i ri nyid dang // dra ba 'dzin dang audyan dang // aar bu da yang de bzhin gnas //
translated: and the stages of the world were taught.🔽The abodes are the mountains of Pūrva,🔽Godānīya, Apara, and Videha,

original: go d'a ba ri nye gnas te //
analyzed: go d'a ba ri nye gnas te //
translated: and the neighboring abodes are

original: dga' ba'i dbang phyug lha mo'i mkhar //
analyzed: dga' ba'i dbang phyug lha mo'i mkhar //
translated: the fortress of the goddess of Kāmarūpa,

original: gyad yul yang ni nye gnas so //
analyzed: gyad yul yang ni nye gnas so //
translated: and the land of the wrestlers.🔽The abodes of the gods of the desire realm and the form realm are

original: 'dod gzugs de bzhin ao tre dang // tri sha ku ne ko sal zhing //
analyzed: 'dod gzugs de bzhin ao tre dang // tri sha ku ne ko sal zhing //
translated: Oḍra, Triśākuni, and Kośala,

original: ka ling ka dang lam pa ka /🔽k'a nytsi kha pa'i gnas nye zhing //
analyzed: ka ling ka dang lam pa ka / k'a nytsi kha pa'i gnas nye zhing //
translated: Kāliṅga, and Lampāka.🔽Kāñcī and Kāpiśī are the neighboring abodes.

original: yi dvags grong dang khyim lha mo //
analyzed: yi dvags grong dang khyim lha mo //
translated: The abodes of the pretas and the yakṣas

original: soo r'ashta dang gser gling ni //🔽'dun sa'o nye ba'i 'dun sa ni //
analyzed: soo r'ashta dang gser gling ni // 'dun sa'o nye ba'i 'dun sa ni //
translated: are Saurāṣṭra and Suvarṇadvīpa.🔽The assemblies are in the cities of

original: grong khyer sindhu ma ru dang // ku lu t'a yang nye 'dun sa //🔽'du ba chu klung 'gram dang ni //
analyzed: grong khyer sindhu ma ru dang // ku lu t'a yang nye 'dun sa // 'du ba chu klung 'gram dang ni //
translated: Sindhu, Maru, and Kulatā.🔽The neighboring assemblies are🔽on the banks of rivers, in parks, and on the shores of the ocean.

original: skyed tshal rgya mtshor rab bshad @135b dang; ;lam gyi bzhi mdo'i nye 'du ba //
analyzed: skyed tshal rgya mtshor rab bshad @135b dang; ;lam gyi bzhi mdo'i nye 'du ba //
translated: The crossroads are the neighboring assemblies.

original: ri yi spyi bo grong dbus dang // tshogs can gzhon nu'i ri dang ni //
analyzed: ri yi spyi bo grong dbus dang // tshogs can gzhon nu'i ri dang ni //
translated: The peak of the mountain, the center of the town, and the mountain of the youthful assembly,

original: rigs kyi zhing yang nye 'du ba'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi zhing yang nye 'du ba'o //
translated: are the field of the family, and the gathering.

original: dur khrod mu mu ni ya nas //
analyzed: dur khrod mu mu ni ya nas //
translated: The charnel ground is Mumunīyā.

original: spyod dang hi ri ki la dang // sgyu ma'i grong khyer dur khrod do //
analyzed: spyod dang hi ri ki la dang // sgyu ma'i grong khyer dur khrod do //
translated: The practice is in Hiriki, and the illusory city is the charnel ground.

original: nye ba'i dur khrod ri mtha' dang // sngags kyi zhing dang lha yi grong //
analyzed: nye ba'i dur khrod ri mtha' dang // sngags kyi zhing dang lha yi grong //
translated: The neighboring charnel ground is the end of the mountain, the field of mantra, and the city of the gods.

original: karna ta dang pat yang //
analyzed: karna ta dang pat yang //
translated: Karṇāṭa and Pūrṇagiri

original: de bzhin grong mthar bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin grong mthar bshad pa'o //
translated: are explained as the outskirts of the town.

original: grong mtha' kong ka na nyid dang // khyab bdag las kyi yul ljongs dang // rnal 'byor ma ni stug po'i grong //
analyzed: grong mtha' kong ka na nyid dang // khyab bdag las kyi yul ljongs dang // rnal 'byor ma ni stug po'i grong //
translated: The outskirts are Koṅkana itself, the land of the all-pervading lord, and the city of the dense yoginīs.
